He has already checked it to ensure it is of no danger. He is aware of the content written in it but refrained from speaking. She hates it when people reveal things without confirming it herself——Elalude knows about the temperament of the Emperor well. Yet still, he feels unease.

I can’t believe that guy actually got the recognition to become a (official) Demon Lord. That aside……. What is the meaning of calling me to his festival?

In fact, there was actually no need for Duke Elalude to show the letter to the Emperor as it was meant for the Duke himself. Yet the letter writes 「If you are attending, please reply with the number of attendees」.

If it is asking for the number of participants, it can be interpreted as an invitation to bring whoever one wishes.

   

Then, who should he invite along? That is the problem.

It is natural to bring guards along since the Duke can’t attend it alone. Some nobles caught wind of him having a meeting there in the past, so many have stated their wish to visit as well. The topic regarding Tempest Federation becoming a new trading nation has become popular among the high-ranked nobles in Sorcerer’s Dynasty Sarion.

Yet nobles are not the only ones interested. In the past, when he reported the results of the meeting with Rimuru to the Emperor, she glared at him coldly and commented in annoyance.

「——Oh. So you went to such an interesting place by yourself? Well aren’t you a bigshot, Elalude; you must have had a lot of fun. Why did you ditch me and go by yourself? Let alone proclaiming yourself my envoy and establishing diplomatic ties with them. Given the significance of the matter, I would have wanted to see things for myself.」

 

This was how it went down……    

But Elalude had things to say in his defence as well. He may have visited the Tempest Federation in the name of rescuing his daughter, it was still considered the real “kingdom of monsters”. Even though he had been using a homunculus, he’d had no idea what type of situation he’d run into there. He couldn’t say with confidence that there would not be any danger, so how could he have invited the Emperor Elmesia to that kind of place?

Yet she still scolded Duke Elalude harshly:

「With such an intriguing creature (slime) out there, I would’ve wanted to see it with my own eyes. I would have gotten to meet a new Demon Lord; in all my years of life I’ve never encountered such a thing before. Yet you got to enjoy all of that by yourself? Do you know what 『snatching credit』[44] is? Even my trusted aide dares to treat me like that, what a sad life of an Emperor I am living——」

   

Her complaints kept on firing without pause——

「——I’m so envious……. Hold on a second, isn’t this just too out of line? There’s no knowing how much fun you had……. No actually, there’s no knowing how dangerous it was, so how dare you act on your own. Absolutely unacceptable!」

——something along those lines, a great tantrum was thrown.

It was more like whining than a scolding.

In front of her subjects, her emotionless expression is like an icy mountain, and so people are led to believe that Emperor Elmesia is cruel and ruthless.

The only time the Emperor shows the other side of her personality is if she’s alone with Duke Elalude or with one other individual. So it can be said that the responsibility on Elalude’s shoulders is particularly heavy.

Aren’t you overplaying your feigned innocence a bit too much!——Elalude always complains internally.

Nowadays his budget is frozen because of the Emperor’s tantrum, and the plan for technological collaboration with Tempest Federation was put on hold. That’s why he wants to pamper the Emperor back into a good mood so he can resume preparations to collaborate with Tempest.

If he did not inform the Emperor about this beforehand, and went to attend by himself, he would definitely have pissed her off. At that point Elalude fears that the consequences would not be so simple as to freeze his budget.

The letter states that Rimuru is hosting a presentation, but in reality it must be some form of intimidation. The goal is to show off how powerful Demon Lord Rimuru is. There seems to be a festival that will be hosted along with it with elaborately prepared recreational activities. It is unknown what will be included in it, but their programs seem to be quite substantial...

Given that the event seems rather lively, there’s no way Emperor Elmesia, someone who’s been living an all-too-boring life would miss it. It is foreseeable that she will inquire about the event from start to end and interrogate Elalude if he did not report to her. The intensity of that fury would definitely be beyond his imagination.

Based on these considerations, Elalude decided not to hide anything and thus is showing her the letter now.

As he is thinking about this, Elmesia lifts her head as she finishes the letter. He quickly tightens his posture. Elmesia stares at Elalude as he does so and says:

 

「So, what do you plan to do?」

「『Plan to do』meaning?」

Elalude is trying to play dumb. He knows what Elmesia wants to say. But he can’t point it out directly.

It would make national headlines if the Emperor Elmesia is to attend the festival. Knowing the significance of such an event, Elalude won’t dare to say too much.

I’ll see what the emperor decides to do first——Elalude thinks to himself.

   

「Oh——Are you trying to play dumb now? Did you know, Elalude, that the quality of the desserts we are importing from Yoshida-san’s store seem to have improved immensely as of late. Do you know the reason?」

Elmesia suddenly changes the topic. Confused, Elalude has no idea what to say in response.

「You enjoy the reputation as a prominent adviser yet you have no clue about the lives of the civilians? How disappointing.」

「My most sincere apologies, Sire. Isn’t Yoshida-san the baker Sire likes, whose shop opened in Ingracia Kingdom? Although he doesn’t possess combat ability, he is still under protection due to his identity as an 『Otherworlder』. It is the first time I’ve heard that you’ve been importing desserts from this Yoshida-san’s shop. What does it have to do with Rimuru-dono’s invitation?」

It is always alright to ask when you don’t know.

People who aren’t close to the Emperor would most definitely lose their job if asking such, but Elalude won’t be affected. He knows the most genuine side of the Emperor, and that close bond allows Elalude to question her.

「What, so you really didn’t know. Elen has been buying the desserts as souvenirs for me since a couple years back. You must have not received one.」

「WHAT——!」

Elalude couldn’t help but shout. He has suffered damage beyond repair learning that his daughter Elen doesn’t buy any souvenirs for him.

Seeing how frustrated Elalude looks, Elmesia laughs, satisfied, while saying:

   

「Since I had the pleasure of seeing such a dramatic (miserable) expression on your face, I won’t spare any details. Allow me to explain. It seems that Yoshida-san’s confectionery has been getting ingredients from someone else since then. Because the variety of items has increased splendidly, the quality of taste also seems to have increased. And most importantly, I’ve been getting goods from him by offering financial support.」

And as such, Elmesia begins to explain in detail.

Elalude is aware of this person called Kaoru Yoshida. His identity as an 「Otherworlder」 alone is enough to make him a target of investigation, so naturally he already knows the relevant information about him.

According to his intelligence, Kaoru Youshia runs a dessert place called Cafe (Kissaten)[45] in the capital of Ingracia Kingdom.

 

He allegedly doesn’t have any skills, but whether this is true or not is unknown. However, his bakery skill of dessert making is top notch. It is rumored that even the head of the Freedom Association shows up to taste his food. And according to suspicious sightings, Hinata the Saint has been spotted to have snuck in and out of the location. The business there seems to be booming. This is information that even Elalude knows, yet Elmesia continues to gush over the tasty desserts as she continues.

「I once went out of my way to invite Yoshida-san here. Speaking of Elen’s souvenir gift, that cake was extremely delicious. So I hoped to make him the appointed patissier of our nation. Yet I was turned down. No matter how much money I would offer, Yoshida-san was not willing to come here——」

According to Emperor Elmesia, the man named Yoshida doesn’t seem to be moved by money. So she was forced to depend solely on the limited number of souvenir gifts she had to make it through life.

What have you been up to, Sire——! Elalude gasps internally. Yet given how Elalude is already feeling, what Elmesia has to say next is even more impactful.

「Recently however, Yoshida-san said that he was closing shop. Whether he is opening a new store or moving away is still under investigation…… With that being said, don’t you think it is a big problem to not be able to eat desserts during break time?」

「I don’t think so, what is the issue?」

「Oh——how could you say such things? Elen really likes the desserts there. If we can set up a more convenient way to purchase them, don’t you think she would come back more frequently?」

「Sire, w-what are talking about!」

 

「In fact, she has actively attended all of our regular tea parties.」

A truly shocking fact. Elalude has always thought that his daughter didn’t even want to come near her hometown. To him, Elmesia’s series of confessions have left him broken and depressed.

It’s one thing that her two bodyguards have been useless, but it’s an entirely different matter that the people he sent to watch over her have not reported anything of this sort.

Those guys… I’m gonna teach them a lesson later——Elalude thinks to himself.

First however, it is more important to hear what Elmesia has to say.

   

「Now the matter is of utmost importance!」

「Right? I’ve actually gotten hold of some very reliable information about it using my wealth and influence.」

「Do tell.」

「It’s really shocking, the place he wants to move to is that Tempest Federation you visited! What did you see when you last visited that nation?」

After being pointed out by her, Elalude recalls something as well. He’d heard that the dishes served by that kingdom were all delicious, and his daughter Elen was greatly moved by one of the desserts. He recalls Elen exclaiming excitedly 「As expected from Shuna-san, you were even able to recreate that new dish!」

 

「Ah! So that’s what you are hinting at!」

Elalude couldn’t help but shout, to which Elmesia sighs, baffled.

 

「Seriously now, are you really as smart as they say?」

Hearing this, Elalude’s confidence vanishes with the comment:

「I’m such an embarrassment……」

 

He apologizes earnestly.

The reason why his boss, the Emperor has been upset is now clear. She misunderstood and thought that Elalude wanted to have all the desserts for himself. Even though it would be for his daughter, there’s no way Elalude would go to that extent.

「How would I know whether you would have done it or not; with a father’s love for his daughter and all that, you know…….」

Due to Elalude’s obliviousness on these many subjects, the Emperor’s suspicion towards him has gradually dissipated. Yet this lack of knowledge has turned to her mocking him of such unawareness of these important incidents.

Elalude willingly endured the blow. He then switches his mindset to discuss another thing.

「By the way, Sire. We should get back on track, how will we respond to Rimuru-dono?」

Elmesia grins sneakily upon being asked by Elalude.

   

「About that……」

She’s keeping him in the loop and isn’t giving an answer.

Elalude fights back his impatience, he is not stupid enough to cut in now. As mentioned before, once the Emperor moves out, it will become a major state affair. If it is initiated by Elalude, there will most definitely be some objections. Things will undoubtedly become difficult if someone tries to intervene.

The powerful nation of Sorcerer’s Dynasty Sarion has prospered under the rule of Sorcerer King, Emperor Elmesia.

Under her are the thirteen noble houses[46], each with their own lord. Everyone pledges their loyalty towards the Emperor Elmesia. Basically, she permits each house to have executive power over their own domains. The imperial house on the other hand, relies on the taxations from the thirteen vassal families.

None of the noble houses possess any military capabilities. With all of the military power concentrated within the imperial house, the Emperor is the supreme commander of the military, responsible for mediating relations between states.

Elalude is from one of the noble houses as well. His mother Elise Grimwald has long held the top position of the thirteen houses. Elise is also the grandmother of Emperor Elmesia; yet another person that Elalude has to bow towards. Something off-topic: Elalude’s brother——and Elmesia’s father——was tragically killed during a battle against monsters. That was before Sarion was established as a kingdom and well before Elalude was born. To him, it is tale from ancient times. In other words, his niece Elmesia is the same (a person from ancient times), who has lived far longer than Elalude. It is no wonder that Elalude can’t raise his head in front of her.

Now, to put aside the matter of his mother Elise, let’s talk about the people from the other aristocratic families…… There are some mean characters among them as well.

There are lords who hide in their domains without any official duty and aren’t willing to come out. Then there are those that attempt to meddle in state affairs using their authority. Some even believe that Emperor Elmesia won’t interfere with politics at all, emboldening them to the point that they would try to exploit opportunities in an attempt to amass power for their own house.

As a countermeasure, it is one of Elalude’s duties as Duke to keep a watchful eye on them. It is precisely because of Elalude’s position that he needs to act cautiously regarding this current situation.

A leisurely tour abroad may not be a problem, but this is the Monster Kingdom he is going to. He fears there may be some individuals laying in wait, ready to use anything as leverage in order to take him down. Other than that, there isn’t much that is likely to happen. However, there is no way to rule out any devious assassination attempt on the Emperor. Before they can even set off, thorough preparations are an absolute requirement in order to prevent such a catastrophe from ever unfolding.

「You are worrying too much, Elalude-chan~」

「S-Sire?」

「No matter what those little boys[47] have in mind, they won’t go so far as to harm me——」

The aura of Elmesia has changed. She is emitting the unique aura of a ruler. One that does not tolerate anyone’s betrayal——It is the overlord side of Emperor Elmesia that the public sees.

To the eyes of Elmesia who has lived a lasting life, those cunning lords, including Elalude, are all probably like a bunch of cocky little kids.

Elalude is extremely nervous as he gulps over and over. The two have been holding a familiar conversation due to their blood relation, yet the difference between the two is like heaven and earth. Even though Elalude himself is a hero figure, he is someone of a completely different 「Status」. It would be impossible for him to feel at ease during their conversation.

「That Demon Lord is called Rimuru, right? He’s no opponent to underestimate.」

「——What do you mean?」

Of course he’s a force to be reckoned with. His personal strength alone goes without saying, yet his ability to exercise control over all monsters under his rule as well as having them obey his every order is no feat to be taken lightly. Moreover, his strategies of building cooperative relations with the neighbouring nations make him an unprecedented type of Demon Lord.

However, this is all common sense, there was no way that Emperor Elmesia would point it out without a reason. Considering this, Elalude posed a question.

 

「Hehe, that Demon Lord called Rimuru, didn’t he agree to build a road to our nation Sarion without so much as a second thought?」

「Yes. They demanded some rights, for instance tax collection for people using the road, but they are willing to provide all of the labor.」

「That’s precisely the point. That right alone would bring enormous wealth. Dear Elalude, you should know just by looking at me, right?」

Elmesia turns back to her friendly self and after having it pointed out to him, a sudden realization strikes Elalude.

「Should I call it a 『Privilege』?」

Of course Elalude has noticed as well: that what Rimuru saw value in was the 「Privilege」. That’s why after careful consideration, he was willing to negotiate with Elalude.

Yet Elmesia sneers at Elalude.

「You are still too naive. Species with longevity like us must always plan with long-term profits in mind first and foremost. Surely you should know this principle?」

「Of course I do. I’ve carefully considered both the toll for using the road built by Demon Lord Rimuru as well as the cost of building the road ourselves.」

Despite Elmesia’s retort, Elalude still answered feeling justified.

Even though we need to pay toll, it is still a lot cheaper in comparison——or so Elalude thinks.

In fact, in order to construct a highway in the Jura Great Forest, notoriously plagued by monsters, it would require enormous funds and a lengthy amount of time.

Between the border of Jura Great Forest and Sarion lies the Coscia Mountain (クツヤ山脈), on top of it resides the aggressive tribe of Tengu, who hold disdain for whoever arrives. One can only imagine the difficulty in trying to communicate with them. Even with that problem resolved, there are still many beasts and monsters[48] left residing in the Great Forest.

Monsters would not be the only factor posing an obstacle: the complex terrain there is also another huge hindrance. They will need to drill tunnels through mountains and put up bridges over rivers and valleys. On top of achieving such difficult tasks, they will still need to prevent the workers from being harmed by vicious monsters.

Monumental construction efforts of that magnitude must surely force a nation to undertake a hundred-year plan. It would not be an impossible feat for a great nation such as Sarion, however, Elalude doesn’t think the expense spent on such construction will be earned back smoothly. Demon Lord Rimuru’s proposal was more than what Elalude could bargain for given all of the amazing terms.

「How hopelessly naive.」

Elalude’s thoughts however, are ruthlessly rejected by Elmesia.

 

「Sure, it will be hard to explore that forest. To this day we haven’t done so because there is no benefit in doing that.」

Elmesia begins to elaborate upon her thoughts, attempting to enlighten Elalude. Just as Elalude thought, given the circumstances, making back the fund of construction would be infeasible. The difficulties of doing so are numerous, yet there would be little meaning to constructing such a road.

However, that situation has changed.

 

For the longest time, all roads from Sarion have led to one single distant nation, the Dwarven Kingdom——Armored Nation Dwargon. Yet now that there is a newly emerging kingdom in the Jura Great Forest——The road will lead to Jura Tempest Federation. Naturally, the purpose for constructing roads is trade.

Before, technological exchange with the dwarves would certainly help boost the nations technological advancements. But in the end it’s just not worth the effort of having to accomplish such a colossal task. With that being said, the previous order has been entirely disrupted now that the Tempest Federation appeared.

「The vast land of the south owned by Demon Lords has now become domain of Demon Lord Milim, while the two prominent figures 『Beast King (Beast Master)』 Karion and 『Sky Queen』 Frey all became her followers. With the overwhelming military power to back themselves, their nation will no doubt become prosperous. There are also the Western Nations in the north-west and Armored Nation Dwargon in the north. Won’t the relay hub of these nations be none other than the newly risen Tempest Federation?」

   

「——Indeed, you have a point.」

Elalude answers. He has understood what Elmesia is trying to get at. Though that is the case, he does not perceive any severe error in his judgement.

Suddenly he was overcome with a striking realization. As Elmesia has pointed out, there hasn’t been any benefit before, yet now that land within the Jura Great Forest is creating an infinite amount of value. That nation is cluttered at the center of many distinct nations; in other words it will become the center of cultural exchange…… There is destined to be unforeseeable development taking place in the future.

That is what Demon Lord Rimuru wanted, and because Elalude had realized that, he wanted to confirm the diplomatic tie between their nations. Yet the construction of a highway is necessarily linked with grave danger and huge monetary investments——

「My judgement was made considering that the construction work will inevitably require him to invest both funds and armed forces, it is probably more ideal to just pay the tolls and reap the benefits.」

Such was the deduction that Elalude made, in order to justify his agreement to the plan.

Elmesia’s smile remains after hearing Elalude’s answer.

「You have a point. Given any normal circumstances, that would indeed have been the right decision to make, with minimal cost to our own nation. Regrettably, you seem to have overlooked that these people are a long-living species, and there’s a Demon Lord involved as well! One must always think twice when forming an accord with a permanent impact on the nation. That’s why, I’ll give you eighty marks (for the decision).」

「——!」

 

「We should also participate in the construction. Select some people and send them in a group to partake in the project. Leave the matter of defeating monsters to them. If we are to at least be of some help, this effort would probably make our life easier when it comes to the negotiation of the toll.」

「Uhh!」

All the rights derived from building the street will now permanently belong to Demon Lord Rimuru. If they (Sarion) don’t provide aid, it will be hard to turn such a table around. The opponent is a Demon Lord after all, rendering intimidation tactics through military force utterly foolhardy...

After hearing Elmesia’s words, he couldn’t help but to agree. Elalude was blinded by short-term benefits and failed to recognize his blunder.

「I’ve told you that you are too rigid in your thinking, Elalude. You did well to know that the situation would be changing, but you can’t always be bounded by preconceived notions.」

Elalude couldn’t agree more with Elmesia.

   

His line of thought has always been that the construction would be too dangerous to carry out, yet if that wasn’t something one needed to consider, the construction budget isn’t really that high. Moreover, if he sends his own people to help with construction, they may even do some technological exchange and learn from the monsters’ knowledge.

——Uhh, just look at what I have done……. I can’t believe that I lacked the foresight…….

He can almost see Demon Lord Rimuru grinning from the shadows, but Elalude realizes it is too late to regret now.

 

「By the way, don’t you still need to reply to their invitation?」

Switching to a more serious expression, Elmesia starts to speak.

Elalude nods along in earnest.

「Whether it is the dessert shop or the rights to the road, Demon Lord Rimuru understands human society well. There is no denying his identity as an 『Otherworlder』, but moreover he has acquired the power and authority to apply his knowledge and experience. To put aside his status as Demon Lord, the person alone is already very impressive. The students of Hero Shizue Izawa——Whether it is the head of the Freedom Association Yuuki Kagurazaka or commander of the Holy Knight Order Hinata Sakaguchi, both have some power in the Western Nations, yet they cannot rival Demon Lord Rimuru. We will have to participate in this event if we are to get on friendly terms with such an individual. I never had a choice from the start.」

 

Emperor Elmesia has made her decision. Elalude has no more words to say. However, something is still on his mind.

「Sire, I do agree. I’ll find a way to shut the others up. But, we can’t ensure the security of that nation. Regarding the people to accompany you during the visit————」

They were informed that there were some conflicts between Demon Lord Rimuru and the Holy Knight Order. The conflict ended with the overwhelming victory of Demon Lord Rimuru. But unlike the time that Farmus army invaded, the Holy Knights didn’t seem to sustain many casualties.

That was to show the public his confidence, though it also led to people spreading rumors about the naivety of Demon Lord Rimuru. For those who know about the inside story, the event would shatter the will of most people trying to make a move on Rimuru, but there are plenty of fools who would still like to try. Moreover, the powerful individuals (of the world) can no longer ignore him, for if they did, the number of conflicts against that nation would undoubtedly increase.

It’s unlikely anything would happen to Demon Lord Rimuru, but the security there may get worse. It’s fine if it is just me (and the boys) going, but if we are to bring Sire to that kind of place……

These thoughts were circling in Elulade’s head, but since the Emperor has made her decision, Elalude can only brace himself and prepare for the upcoming trials and tribulations.

「Send out the mediator group under the Imperial House. You are free to pick some candidates from the Magus Order (Magus).」

Elmesia says casually while Elalude breaks out in cold sweats.

About this Magus Order, they are the high-ranked military order also known as 「Knights of Purity」. They possess the qualifications to act as mediators and are the plenipotentiary agents of the emperor. All of the members are people with pure blood lines going back many generations and care the most powerful military force of Sorcerer’s Dynasty Sarion——By the way, Elalude is one of them.

The existence of the order is a carefully guarded state secret, yet the Emperor has generously ordered them to move out. Elalude faithfully obeys her order with caution.

「——Understood. We will proceed with the arrangement as you wish.」

He leaves the scene after answering so. The matter of the Emperor’s outing has been decided and will subsequently be announced to the nation.

And so the series of sleepless nights for Duke Elalude unfold……

    ***

The location is the trading house of Brumund Kingdom.

Myourmiles slowly begins to feel anxious not knowing when he will be finishing all of his appointments. He is a very well known merchant and can assess the nature of any man after just one look in their eyes. Some have come here to borrow money or discuss new business opportunities. Occasionally some nobles that have fallen on hard times would come to discuss suspicious trades. It is annoying to deal with these idiots, but sometimes they may indeed bring profitable business. That’s why he can’t hand such critical work to others.

He finishes dealing with a conman looking fellow while thinking so and calls in the next guest.

A well-dressed man enters. However, his appearance cannot fool Myourmiles's eyes. Although his clothes are made of fine materials, its design is out of fashion. This person is only wearing old clothing for show while not being able to purchase the fashionable brands. Moreover, this man will not bring Myourmiles any profit. He is an impoverished nobleman who came to Myourmiles in the hope of selling shoddy items that he proclaimed to be antiques at overblown prices. The memory of that incident is still refreshing to Myourmiles.

He’s probably come up with some new devious ideas trying to swindle money out of me.

But he is a nobleman nonetheless. His nobility has been confirmed after investigation, so he cannot be underestimated. Were Myourmiles to act arrogantly in the face of real nobles, he may get accused of irreverence and even lose his head. That’s why his job is challenging this time.

Eh, how troublesome. Now I’ve got to get my nerves tense to face off against this guy……

While bearing this thought, Myourmiles decides to hear the person out. Unsurprisingly, he got even more annoyed after hearing him out. The proposal turns out to be devious through and through.

This man——Viscount Kazak wishes to open a new shop with his slaves, so he came to loan some money from Myourmiles.

Honestly, Myourmiles can tell it won’t be successful from the onset. A business won’t be turning a profit just because you bought some cute female slaves. It’s of great importance to analyze the market and the target customers as well. It is also obligatory to find a decent location to open the shop as well as deciding on payment for the girls. However, giving such advice to him would amount to nothing more than 「Casting pearls before swine」[49].

「Huh? It’s your job to find the place. And asking me to pay those girls? What a dumb question, what kind of idiot would give salary to slaves?」

 

Like that, Viscount Kazak wouldn’t listen to anything Myourmiles had to say.

Even if forcing the slaves to work without pay is the whole point, you will have to provide them with food regardless. Then there’s also clothes for them to wear and residences for them to live in that must all be planned out beforehand. The point is that buying slaves would inevitably mean a huge long-term investment. The beautiful slaves he wishes to find as an eye-catching attraction can only be found among high-quality slaves whose prices are exorbitant enough to buy entire estates. Rather than having these people run the shop, he’d be better off recruiting average workers. A good example would be the shop opened with Myourmiles's investment in Ingracia Kingdom. No matter how beautiful the woman may be, she will unavoidably age in the end. The money earned through them will hardly be sufficient to recover the initial investments. That is how Myourmiles sees it.

If he is trying to increase the profit rate by also providing sexual services, it can cause the spread of disease in the region if appropriate preparations are not made. Should things end like this, not only would Viscount Kazak face serious problems, but Myourmiles would also become his accomplice.

Myourmiles sighs internally, he has absolutely no desire to participate in such a dangerous ordeal.

「My my, Kazak-sama truly has a pair of wise eyes. Your humble acquaintance Myourmiles is most impressed. However, isn’t the pivotal component, namely slaves, rather hard to purchase here nowadays? Since this country does not permit human-trafficking, is it not arduous to try and find any good-quality ones, when all you have to choose from are enslaved criminals[50]?」

Myourmiles tries to turn him down to prevent trouble, but Viscount Kazak isn’t buying it.

 

「Oh, about that. I’ll let you in on something, I’ve got ways around things, so if you are willing to invest, I may just tell you. But, surely you get what I mean, this is some top secret information…… All I can say is that those slaves are all elves.」

Viscount Kazak says so with an entirely serious expression.

   

Those words made Myourmiles feel sick to the bone. Through sheer willpower alone did he manage to maintain his composure.

He is a famous merchant after all, so he can’t just show his dislike of others on his face. The type of merchant to do that can’t even qualify as third-class; they are a rookie who will never make their business big.

Compared to that, Myourmiles is more intrigued by the elven slaves mentioned by Viscount Kazak. If what he said was true, then it is no longer some simple matter such as regular high-quality slaves.

In fact——

Myourmiles is after all a prominent figure in the region. Since he is the head of an illegal organization, he wouldn’t shy away from illicit affairs. However, he would still know where to stop before things got out of hand. It doesn’t mean he should be forgiven just because of that, but he still doesn’t wish to cross that line of extreme evil. This is how he instructs his subordinates to handle things as well. Precisely because Myourmiles is intensely familiar with shady deals, he cannot ignore the grave danger that comes with buying Elven slaves.

Did he just say Elves? Those things are definitely related to a large criminal syndicate!

Elves are a species of longevity, most of them are blessed with a beautiful appearance, high intelligence and most of them are even talented in magic as well. It is unlikely for Elven slaves to have been enslaved due to criminal activities and since there’s no way anyone can enslave elves that have citizenship, it would mean they preyed upon the reclusive ones living in the forest…

A realization suddenly crosses Myourmiles's mind.

Hiring monster hunters——Whenever some wealthy people wished to get a classy pet, they would hire hunters to capture monsters in the forest. Yet considering the target here is demi-human, or more precisely,of the half-spirit race that elves are, most countries would not turn a blind eye towards such heinous deeds.

The Dwarven Kingdom consists of demi-humans, and as for Sorcerer’s Dynasty Sarion, the Emperor himself is an elf. If this gets exposed, it will lead to severe problems. Theft and fraud——It will be no petty crime like that, it bears the potential of becoming a diplomatic disaster. Myourmiles certainly does not dare to carry out such an ordeal so uncaringly……

For the goal of profit, even taking human lives would be an option while having a terrifying criminal organization behind the scene as backup…… Myourmiles senses several red flags popping up..

He drains his brain thinking, trying to find an appropriate excuse to turn down Viscount Kazak’s demands. Deep in thought without any good ideas yet, there is a sudden commotion that may or may not have just helped him out of this situation ——

「Hey——! How have you been? Myourmiles-kun!」

 

As they are halfway through their business, someone opens the door and enters.

She’s an angelic beauty with light-blue silver hair and golden eyes——Wait, or could he be a boy?

 「Who the hell are you, how dare you butt in on our important business meeting, ya rude piece of shit!」[51]

The voice of Viscount Kazak seems very distant to Myourmiles. He is shocked to discover the identity of the visitor. He can’t forget about that face, the hero who saved Myourmiles——It’s the real Demon Lord Rimuru in person. He knows Rimuru is the ruler of the Monster Kingdom and he also heard that Rimuru wanted to become a real Demon Lord, at the time he was quite surprised.

Yet Rimuru really managed to pull it off. He is now a member of the 「Eight-Star Demon Lord (Octagram)」 recognized by the other Demon Lords.

With that being said, Demon Lord Rimuru seems to have taken a liking in Myourmiles. The two are very close, and have even collaborated in making money. He asked Myourmiles to find ways to sell healing potions, right now the profit margin has become quite stable. Soon after that he asked Myourmiles for a favour to help him explore the market in order to sell otherworld food such as ramen. They are now being served in restaurants and are receiving great reviews. Later Myourmiles also helped to taste test something called hamburger. Rimuru has made plans to open chain stores that sell them. Myourmiles also took care to handle the plans responsibly. Right now he is finding new employees, doing employee training and attempting to arrange interior decoration for the stores. He’s been extremely busy doing preparations in all these areas.

He wanted to show his gratitude to Rimuru for all these things, but he seemed to have been busy lately. It’s been a month since they last had any contact.

 「Eh, isn’t this master[52] Rimuru? Didn’t you say that it is currently a critical time period and that you have no spare time to stroll around?」

Myourmiles couldn’t help but ask due to his shock.

 

Since this person——Master Rimuru, or Demon Lord Rimuru is currently busy confronting issues between himself and the Holy Knight Order. After all, he previously said it himself that 「The circumstance may get quite dangerous lately, so you better stay away for now」.

There’s also the Freedom Association branch leader Fuze who has been very frustrated over the fact that he isn’t capable of stopping Hinata the Saint himself. All of that was supposed to be the case, but how did the main person involved suddenly appear here?

——With all these thoughts crossing his mind, Myourmiles has thrown Viscount Kazak who he was just dealing with to the back of his mind.

A moment later Myourmiles heard his servant running in to intervene in panic while shouting: 「P-Please hold on! Our master is still in a meeting!」

It seems that some people are still not used to it. One not used to looking at that beautiful face would quickly lose their minds over it. How uncourteous.

Although it was very impolite, it is something that really can’t be helped. Myourmiles is no exception either, if he doesn’t make up his mind he may easily get mesmerized as well. His face looks fine when he’s talking to someone or when he’s coming up with some devious ideas, but whenever Rimuru is acting normal, he appears to be a completely different person that gives off a tender sense of affection.

Myourmiles can’t really blame the servant for his behaviour.

 「Did you just call him 『Master Rimuru』?」

Viscount Kazak tries to interject, but Myourmiles ignores him. However Rimuru seems to have found out (about the guest) and looks quite embarrassed.

 「Ah, sorry. So you have a guest here. Then I’ll stop by your estate to wait for you there, I’ll see you later!」

Myourmiles was still in a state of shock, until Rimuru’s words brought him back to his senses. He feels somewhat sympathetic looking at Viscount Kazak who just shouted 「Rude piece of shit」 at a Demon Lord.

If Master Rimuru wasn’t such a kind person……. This guy would probably be a goner by now…….

Myourmiles thinks to himself.

The saying goes 「Ignorance is bliss」, but Myourmiles is still troubled about whether he would inform Kazak about this or not. While not knowing Myourmiles's concern, Viscount Kazak continues to shout rudely.

「Oi, brat. Actually, little girl I guess? Are you supposed to be Myourmiles's mistress or something? You barged in to eavesdrop without permission and interfered with our important business, how do you plan to compensate?」

Viscount Kazak starts to spout such things as he sees Rimuru’s face. Myourmiles is immediately filled with displeasure as he hears it.

This guy! How dare he talk to Master Rimuru in that way——

Myourmiles is on tenterhook as he sees Viscount Kazak figuratively licking over Rimuru’s body with his disgusting look.

「How impolite of me. Ah, no one managed to stop me, so I’m really sorry.」

Rimuru says in response and apologizes, lowering his status.

 

Yet Viscount Kazak decides to pull rank and not forgive him.

「Oh, you are pretty good looking. Mannerism is quite important however, luckily for you I wouldn’t mind giving you a private lesson on that.」

In the end he only saw Rimuru’s beauty and even dared to say such a thing. Now even Myourmiles is angered, his feeling can no longer be described with being stunned.

Why am I getting looked down on by this type of nobody……?

Myourmiles is completely dumbfounded.

It’s one thing that he got looked down on, but he went on to call Rimuru, who Myourmiles is indebted to, his mistress. He can’t allow the Viscount to insult people like that. The behaviour of Viscount Kazak has exceeded Myourmiles's limit of tolerance.

Myourmiles was however the one at a disadvantage, if he is to get in a spat with a nobleman, he may be accused of irreverence. With that being said, there is no need to let him do whatever he wants. Myourmiles has been acting politely because he doesn’t want any trouble, but if the person intends to antagonize him, he will face him head-on.

Myourmile solidified his resolve.

「Oi, Kazak, it is you who are being rude to my benefactor. You are but a Viscount, do you intend to piss me off?」

「W-What!」

「My business with you ends this instant. Do not come to me for any favour in the future!」

「Ya, ya bastard! A mere merchant dares to disobey a noble, Myourmiles, have you lost your mind!」

「Heh! Anyone who plans to collaborate with a criminal organization that may cause diplomatic issues is a certified troublemaker to me, who may even get this whole town to stink. I hope a plague bringer[53] like you would scram as soon as possible.」

「M-Myourmiles, you bastard! You, you’ve forgotten the debt of my prestigious visit before…… Mark my words I’ll make you regret this!」

Viscount Kazak leaves these words after Myourmiles's scolding. He sees that Myourmiles's men are coming to check up on the noise and seems to think that the situation is no longer in his favour.

「Hmph, he belittles others even though he’s no better than a nobody himself.」

「E-Eh, Myourmiles-kun? That guy seems pissed, is everything okay?」

Like that, Rimuru casually makes small talk with the furious Myourmiles.

Ah, this guy is not simple after all. He may have become a Demon Lord but he hasn’t really changed a bit——

Upon thinking so, Myourmiles loosens up. Afterward, he rejects all of the people waiting to meet him in the next room and chases all of them out.

There are things in this world where you have to strike while the iron is hot. Myourmiles is not stupid enough to pass up important opportunities. He is a smart and capable man who would even go so far as to check for rough diamonds in a pile of pebbles. But it is also an undeniable fact that there are things that he would sacrifice everything for. All in all, the real reason behind his actions is that he doesn’t wish to keep Rimuru waiting.

It is not because Rimuru would bring him enormous profit, he isn’t that short sighted. Rather, he sees an extraordinary virtue within Rimuru, that being how he still has his trade partner in mind despite the difficult circumstances he himself is in. It is because Rimuru is such a person, Myourmiles reaffirms his vow to never betray Rimuru. He can’t think of any work that could be more important than spending time with Rimuru.

Is he up to some new devious idea? Upon thinking so, Myourmiles begins to feel excited. He is acting faster than usual and pushed all the cases to his subordinates. A secret surge of joy floods his heart.

And on that day——

A new opportunity arises that will put an end to the frustrating life Myourmiles was living.

Following Myourmiles's lead, we move to his estate.

Myourmiles's butler immediately comes out to welcome us upon seeing me. He must have gotten to know me after my several visits in the past.

There’s no need to be so courteous——That’s what I say to him every time.

Myourmiles doesn’t seem to mind either and gives his servants the instructions with a smile. As usual, he has ordered desserts and tea for me.

「Ah, I’m really sorry, I seem to have interfered with your work.」

Myourmiles begins to complain to me with a ghastly expression.

Oh, so that perverted guy was a nobleman?

Now that I can completely suppress my aura, I can show my face directly when visiting human towns. It’s rather convenient since I broke my mask again the day I became a Demon Lord and haven’t gotten around to fixing it yet. That’s why as soon as that mister saw my face, he must have mistaken me for a young girl. But, I won’t lash out over such minor things. Unlike Veldora or Shion, I know how to read the situation. I kept an extra eye out having noticed how arrogantly he was acting, it seems that was the right call. Speaking of which, since Myourmiles has cut ties with him, maybe I don’t really need to worry so much.

「Indeed, considering that man called Kazak is hard to deal with. Speaking of his proposal this time, he is trying to use slaves, even elven ones……」

「Elves?」

 

I ask out of surprise.

Speaking of elves, there are many of them at that nightclub in the Dwarven Kingdom. I also heard that Elen has an Elven bloodline, but they are not considered to be monsters, but rather demi-humans. Legally speaking human-trafficking is banned, so isn’t that just straight up criminal activity?

「That is hard to determine. Despite how the man looked, Kazak is still given the rank of Viscount. Brumund is a small kingdom, so there aren’t that many noblemen. Even suckers like him have considerable authority.」

I can’t believe that man just now was a Viscount. Well it’s no wonder that he would call me rude, but if that’s the case, he would be a higher-ranked nobleman than Fuze’s friend Baron Belyard. It’s no surprise Myourmiles said that he’s hard to deal with.

「Is it really okay?」

「No problem, I’m an underworld boss after all. There’s no need for Master Rimuru to worry, I can sort things out with my own power!」

Myourmiles responds to my worries with a smile.

What underworld?! Where is such a place in Brumund even?![54]

I guess he was referring to the slum, but that place is heaven compared to the environment where Youmu grew up, considering that Brumund Kingdom is a nation with relatively good public order. However, I still have to give him some words of advice.

 

「Hold on hold on, you really ought to be more careful since I’m here to give you an important job.」

Indeed, I’ve consulted many things with Myourmiles. If he ended up getting harmed because of grudges held by some strange noble, I would be really troubled.

「Wahaha! Rest assured. I, Myourmiles have a lot of confidence in my good luck. After all, even Master Rimuru is in such a good relationship with me!」

Myourmiles laughs out loud seemingly wanting to dismantle my worries.

 

I’ve been defeated, but that’s why I like him. It would be too late if something happened to him, so I should send out a bodyguard beforehand to protect Myourmiles, I just have to make sure he doesn’t find out.

I thought to myself while facing the laughing Myourmiles.

「By the way, Master Rimuru, why have you come here today?」

Upon being asked, I recall my reason for visiting.

We plan to gather all the monsters from the Jura Great Forest and the leaders of human nations to host a large-scale celebration.

The name of it is——「Tempest State-Founding Festival」[55].

The date of the event has been officially decided.

Now that we’ve made peace with Hinata’s party, all of the worries are gone with the wind. The date of Youmu’s coronation has also been settled, which on the one hand is in hope that he will come to support us (during the festival) and on the other to promote his crowning to the neighbouring nations.

Right now Rigurdo and his men are working intensively and sending out invitations to the leaders of the world.

In addition, Rigurdo’s men are not the only ones working hard. The monsters under my leadership have all heard of the incoming national celebration; everyone is excited and all my executives have also come up with plans which were announced afterwards.

Let’s take Shuna as an example, who has been preparing a variety of new dishes to serve to the visitors. Moreover, she’s been working tirelessly to create colourful cakes in an effort to open up a cafe of her very own in my nation. I’ve also introduced the renowned pastry chef Yoshida-san from Ingracia, who took care of me back then, to Shuna.

It was a futile effort to try and convince Yoshida-san to open a store in Tempest. He wouldn’t budge no matter how many times I tried to convince him and regardless of what I offered, yet he couldn’t help himself once he met Shuna. (Kaijin: Get in line!)

Shuna bowed her head politely to request the favour. Her hands fold beautifully as she bows, the elegance of her movements was mesmerizing.

   

Yoshida-san tried to play cool on the surface, yet he was totally wrecked on the inside. It looked like we were about to finally win him over…

「——Uh. There is no chance you can beat me with seduction. If you truly wish me to move no matter what, then show me how excellent your ability to cook is! If you can make dishes that would satisfy me, I may just reconsider things.」

   

Due to Yoshida-san’s proposal, the whole thing turned into a culinary showdown somehow. But it didn’t pose a problem at all. Shuna’s culinary skills are after all top-notch, to which everyone would agree.

Yoshida-san complained to me, which I ignored completely.

Shuna was highly motivated. It’s Yoshida-san’s art of cooking that has ignited her fighting spirit. She would use the kitchen to prepare cuisines beyond simply being delicious. And the dish was——Tamagoyaki~[56].

This is the ultimate delicacy that is rumored to show a chef’s skill from its making alone.

Yoshida-san gulped as he saw her serving the dish. He then begins to use a fork to silently place the tamago inside his mouth.

 

「Delicious!!」

Instant KO~

After having a taste of Shuna’s overwhelming culinary skill, Yoshida-san finally recognized her.

The brawny man promised Shuna with an awkward smile. Against the cute girl with light pink hair that was Shuna, I think he was completely mesmerized. ——Or should I call it love at first sight, I’d better keep that to myself. Since he’s making an effort to play it cool, it would be quite pitiful if I pointed it out.

And so, Shuna and Yoshida-san became good partners. Our business will definitely be going through the roof. I have a feeling that they will become the center of attention.

There’s also Gabil. He seemed to have been collaborating with Vesta in hosting a presentation reviewing the history of the healing potion. Gabil and Vesta, Kurobee and Garm.

Speaking of which, Shion isn’t falling behind either, she seems to be planning something as well.

A servant enters to serve us red tea. Because of my previous visits, he has gotten more skillful and has prepared the desserts that I like.

Myourmiles asks worryingly hearing my words. It seems I’ve caused him some unnecessary concern. That does seem like something that gal would say. If she is really coming, reception would probably also take a lot of hard work, so would it be better if she just doesn’t come?

Yep, you’d better not come……

That’s it!

Alright, Myourmiles has decided to listen to his plans.

The content is as follows——

There have been many high-grade inns built in Tempest Federation, which Myourmiles has already checked into before so he’s quite familiar with them.

For nations without a tap water system, filling the bathtub to boil water alone would be a difficult task. For Myourmiles, this is almost common sense, that’s why he can only use “astonishing” to describe having hot spring facilities that can be used at will at anytime……

The program entails sending guides as well as guards to accompany people on a day-long walk deep into the forest. Other programs will include fishing competitions near the neighbouring rivers, hunting conventions so as to get in touch with nature, etc.. The items required would all be available for lease, this way he hopes the registered guests would all be able to have fun.

Rimuru hopes that the opening festival will convince some guests to return in the future for more consumption. For this to be a success, he has come up with a multitude of programs in hopes that the guests won’t get bored.

Just how far into the future has this guy planned… Apart from being utterly baffled, Myourmiles is also impressed.

「——(He has spoken a ton already) so that’s how it was, since nobody could grasp the pattern of his sword swings, it’s what earned him the title 『Shining』. Speaking of which, Master Rimuru’s subordinates also all seem like powerful individuals, I wonder which one is the stron——」

Myourmiles's interest seems to have moved on to Rimuru’s subordinates——In other words, Benimaru and the rest. Speaking of this, there was an asshole Holy Knight called Arno in the past who asked the same question as you just did perhaps in another version of this story. Later they (my lieutenants) one by one began to argue over rankings and boring topics which almost led to serious conflicts. At the time, not everyone was present, so we managed to settle the matter peacefully, so be warned, you should not say such things that will provoke conflicts.」

Rimuru mentions as well that it was fortunate that those who were most likely to cause trouble happened to not be present, and so he was able to muddle through. But since then, they’ve been deliberately avoiding that sensitive topic.

If those executives start a serious quarrel, the town they took so much effort in building would become a victim of as a consequence. Such an outcome should be avoided at all costs and so Myourmiles was advised to be cautious with his words.

「I-I see. Apologies for my offense.」

「It’s fine as long as you keep an eye out for it. But, it’s a rather peculiar viewpoint nonetheless.」

Unlike the fearful Myourmiles, Rimuru doesn’t seem to particularly take it to heart.

This person’s values surely are different from any average person’s——Myourmiles thinks to himself while quietly waiting for Rimuru to speak.

「There’s another empty block in the town, it should be pretty nice to prepare an opera house there. It may turn out that someone is aspiring to become a playwright; it will also complement the new recreational activities. Now regarding a colosseum——」

Rimuru turns to Myourmiles.

From Myourmiles's point of view, Rimuru seems to be grinning. Ah, he must have gotten some devious idea again——While thinking so, he decided to keep his mouth shut.

Master Rimuru, you are an absolute beauty when you are silent, why do you have to put on this deplorable (残念) expression…….

He was thinking something along that line.

「Myourmiles-kun!」

   

Here it comes! Myourmiles's heart tenses up as he engages Rimuru.

「W-What is it?」

 

「You seem to be very familiar with the whole martial tournament thing?」

Rimuru gets up off his chair and moves next to Myourmiles. He whispers next to Myourmiles's ear while giving off a perfect voice of coquetry.

And then, he suddenly announces——They wish to host a martial tournament as well and hope that Myourmiles would help with the arrangement.

「Please hold on, young master! It’s far too late to suddenly tell me about such an important thing……」

「We will be preparing the colosseum, could you help me investigate what is required to host a tournament?」

While ignoring Myourmiles's protest, Rimuru informed him so one-sidedly. Given it has already reached this point, there is no use in resisting.

「Every single time, I can never win against master Rimuru. I understand. Yours truly, Myourmiles will sincerely attend to the matter with all my efforts!」

Myourmiles promised rather helplessly.

But he said so with a thinly veiled smile…… Honestly, Myourmiles doesn’t dislike it. Or rather having entrusted him with such monumental task, his joy is through the roof.

What do you need in order to host it? Not only will he need to investigate, Myourmiles also needs to put his ideas into practice. Never in his life did he dream to be tasked or even work on such a large-scale proposal.

I’ve got to do this one well! T-This must be a once in a lifetime opportunity!

It doesn’t matter even if it fails, Myourmiles pulls himself together.

Regarding people like Rimuru, from Myourmiles's past experience with him, he has realized that minor things won’t be enough to anger him. Moreover, he keeps his promises and is worthy of trust. To a merchant, trust is the most important thing, and Rimuru is the type that garners people’s trust.

Just like he had promised, he will definitely prepare a colosseum. Although it is hard for Myourmiles to wrap his mind around it, Rimuru has complete control over the monsters he rules, they would serve and obey any order he gives.

Even though that’s how he acts, Master Rimuru is still a Demon Lord. If this proposal is lucrative, it wouldn’t be difficult to gather the necessary materials. And to have me to work on the plan——

Myourmiles is extremely moved. While he is entranced, the joyful voice of Rimuru enters his ear.

「Right, by the way. Even though our goal this time is to receive leading figures from different nations, we are allowing normal civilians to attend alongside them. Like in the Ingracia Kingdom tournament, if you can’t involve the public, there isn’t really any benefit to reap, is there?」

「Do you mean the average public?」

「Hmm, I plan to build a colosseum that can seat around fifty-thousand people[60]. There is still a lot of empty land left, so it shouldn’t be an issue. In the surrounding area we will be opening the fast food stores we just discussed Sounds like we could generate a lot of sales, right? Wouldn’t there be cash flow when there’s human flow? We should be expecting a lot of tourists. What do you think, Myourmiles-kun?」

In other words, Rimuru is saying that they would normally be providing recreation that the average public could afford too, maximising their customer base……

What do you think, Myourmiles-kun? Upon being asked this, all Myourmiles can answer is 「That’s beyond my imagination」. By constructing a colosseum that is large enough to include fifty thousand people, it would be able to rival that of Ingracia Kingdom. Or rather, it would be able to accommodate around five times as many spectators. Rimuru must be really serious about this.

「We can have a standing area for people to watch from, that one we won’t be charging anything for. When it comes to the rich, we will direct them to the designated seats and charge entry fees. As for the nobles who are generous with their cash, we will give them the VIP seats. Then we will prepare box seats for specific guests. Those are my thoughts on it, I hope you can help work out the profit margin per seat.」

And as such, Rimuru dumps all the work onto Myourmiles with a smile.

In order to allow peasants and townsfolk from the neighbouring kingdoms to watch the fights as well, he’s preparing areas that don’t charge money——That’s something even the Ingracia Kingdom isn’t doing.

So that’s why they’ve planned it like that, Myourmiles finally understands.

「I see, I was just about to say that fifty-thousand people are too much, so that’s how it is…….」

「Right. This type of event only has value when it draws everyone’s interest. Wouldn’t seats be more valuable when you can sit elegantly while a bunch of others can only stand and watch?」

「Indeed it does. Reserving seats ahead of time would remove the risk of missing out on one entirely, it’s definitely worth it.」

The colosseum in Ingracia acts solely as entertainment for the wealthy, the concept for Rimuru’s is fundamentally different. All in all, its main purpose is to garner attention for the tournament in order to draw in huge crowds.

Myourmiles thinks things over and begins to admire the idea. If an entry fee is not required, peasants during slack season would probably join the fun. As the news spread through these people, average citizens from nearby countries would get interested as well. The point is, if the population of people flowing in exceed tens of thousands, the inns in the streets would no doubt make a lot of money. It would also be quite interesting to open up the fast food stores as mentioned by Rimuru on the way to offer a place to rest.

Moreover, they can also serve the tourists and provide them with a residence to stay at. If Rimuru is able to monetize them with the restaurants, inns or hot spring in the town, the running of the colosseum would be extremely profitable… He can’t help but imagine how the money spent by the people being attracted there alone would fill their pockets.

 

「As expected of master, you’ve calculated it from the start…」

「Eh? Ah, I-I guess so. Yep, it’s all part of my plan!」

 

「It seems that you have plenty of facilities to accommodate people over night. Then the problem will be ensuring regular demand later on, because if we can accomplish that, our profit margin would no doubt skyrocket. Anyway, let’s do promotion first. Then our next step is the proposal that you entrusted me to work on?」

「Eh, yep. That’s it.」

「I see, I see. It will be my job to come up with entertainment that would draw everyone back… Even if the martial tournament this time does not generate any profit, we will make the guests return regardless——If we manage to convince the customers to return, would it mean that our plan is successful?」

「——How impressive that you read my thoughts so well. As expected of Myourmiles-kun, you are the only one suitable for the job!」

The proposed martial tournament that will be used to garner crowds makes Myourmiles shiver in excitement. Rimuru says that arrangement and planning would all be handed to him.

 

This is too intriguing! Myourmiles wants to shout, but he endures.

   

「He…hehehe, that’s making things rather hard on me——」

   

「Wouldn’t such a thing be better handled by the hands of the professional? Myourmiles-kun, could it be, that you are not confident in yourself?」

「HA-HAHAHAHAHA! How harsh, Master Rimuru is quite mean.」

「Hahahaha, right, right. But if it’s Myourmiles-kun, surely you can handle it easily, can’t you?」

The two start laughing out loud. Both give off a devious expression.

「I mean, then you will be mobilizing a lot of money! Surely you are aware of that?」

「Hehehehe, please be reassured. I am best at dealing with money. So I will definitely arrange the best result for master!」

「That’s most certain. I see that it is the right choice to leave the matter to you.」

As they laugh, Rimuru and Myourmiles shake hands with each other.

The event will cost a lot of money. It will be hosted in just the way Rimuru described.

Seriously, this guy is terrifying——Myourmiles thinks to himself.

It is horrifying alone to not know how far ahead he has already planned. Myourmiles proceeds to plan out the ideal blueprint in his mind, even though he’s still got that concern in mind.

「If that is the case, we will have another new usage for healing potions. No matter how severe of an injury they sustain, as long as they don’t die instantly, won’t they all be healed? That would mean that it won’t matter if the contestants get serious. Moreover, wouldn't it be super effective for promotion if we claim that the injured participant would become fully healed in time for the next match?」

「What do you mean?」

「Ah? Have you not considered that?」

「Hmm yeah… of course I have! I just want to confirm whether your idea is any different from mine, that’s all!」

「I see! Hehehe, if it is Master Rimuru, surely such minor matters would be within your expectation. I’ve got to catch up to you.」 

   

With these words said, Myourmiles continues to express his view.

Then they start to talk to each other in 「Right! Yes!」 and begin to discuss all sorts of ideas.

First is the use of the martial tournament to promote the healing potion to sell to the adventurers. Second is regarding the lending and selling of weapons and gears.

「Speaking of the weapons made by Kurobee, even failed works of his will possess incredible quality. And though they are not good enough to debut on their own, he has trained many disciples——」

It would be fine however to sell items crafted by those disciples, Rimuru suggests. That’s why he hopes they will give it a try. Other things include, for instance, running a casino, which will be part of the national enterprise. There seem to be ones running in Ingracia Kingdom. There will be enormous profits just betting on a winner alone. Not only human versus human, it will be interesting to have captured monsters to fight them as well. Of course, there is a need to ensure safety, but right now there are many strong subordinates under Rimuru that can be put to use. That’s why Myourmiles isn’t worried at all that it would pose a problem. Or it (colosseum) can be used as a practice field for rookie adventurers and lend the venue. They can deploy coaches and allow customers to pay for their instruction.

Myourmiles’s head is spinning at a formidable speed, he feels that ideas he has never had kept flowing in. With the help of Rimuru, he is able to come up with countless fantasy-like proposals.

There are so many ideas. On one hand he feels that he has been entrusted with a great responsibility, on the other hand he is also immersed in excitement. Apart from shivering, Myourmiles has made up his mind.

「I’ll do it then. I’ll show you! My soul as a merchant predicts we'll be making a lot of money!」

「Wonderful! What splendid confidence, Myourmiles-kun! Indeed, if it is you, you will definitely make enough money to satisfy me!」

Having been praised by Rimuru, Myourmiles flusters a bit. Seeing this reaction, Rimuru follows up.

If we are able to achieve something great, surely no one will dare to interject, what do you think?」

Rimuru implies with his words that he is convinced the event will be a success, to which Myourmiles is delighted.

What do you think? That line is like a divine melody touching Myourmiles’s heart as it echoes next to his ears.

He nods his head firmly.

「——I have truly been defeated. Young master, no, Rimuru-sama. I, Myourmiles, will assure the success of the plan no matter what so as to become a subject of Rimuru-sama!」

Myourmiles agrees without hesitation. That is only natural.

He has so much faith in me. Failure is not an option!

After living for so long, Myourmiles is once again feeling the sensation of having trouble sitting still as he feels his body and mind flamed by his excitement, hopes and dreams combined. This sensation is too precious for him to lose.

「You are being too dramatic, Myourmiles-kun.」

 

Rimuru laughs while saying so, the two then proceed to do more detailed planning, during which Myourmiles’s excitement showed no signs of dissipating.

I’ll make this festival a success and become Rimuru’s trusted subject——With this new ambition in mind, Myourmiles swears to pledge his life to Rimuru even at the cost of destroying his body and soul.

By the time Rimuru had left, Myourmiles gathered all his lackeys and servants.

The ex-Rank C adventurer Bydd who is now Myourmiles’s personal bodyguard asks. Myourmiles nods his head dramatically and says:

Bydd laughs as he says so, but he didn’t mean what he said.

Just like Myourmiles, he was also saved by Rimuru and one of the people who were charmed by this Demon Lord. While he said that he was ordered all over the place, the person looking forward to it more than anyone is none other than Bydd.

Cracking a smile, Myourmiles continues.

He was already born with a villain-looking face, it becomes much more terrifying with a bit of killing intent. Nowadays his subordinates are no longer scared of his face, but they couldn’t hide their shock at Myourmiles’s words.

「Master, what do you mean by that?」

The butler asks in everyone’s place, Myourmiles on the other hand briefly summarizes the conversation he had with Rimuru for them. He explains that Tempst is holding a kingdom-founding festival, and during which they will be hosting a martial tournament as a recreational event. Every single member of the Tempest Federation would be contributing to the festival, so naturally its scale would be beyond Myourmiles’s imagination.

He excitedly announces to everyone that he has been given a crucial role during such an event. At the end of his speech, he declares as follows:

「I’ve decided to pledge my allegiance to Rimuru-sama. So the proposal this time has to be carried out successfully no matter what!」

His announcement causes his subordinates to gasp. Myourmiles isn’t planning to come back to Brumund Kingdom——After learning his resolve, his subordinates look at each, all looking confused.

「Hehe, Myourmiles-sama. Surely you are not planning to go alone, right? I may just be a common thug, but I am also a bodyguard. The lackeys under my command also admire Rimuru-sama a lot, so do bring us along!」

「If we are really going there, you alone won’t be able to protect me.」

「T-that’s so mean!」

「Of course I will, I am willing to do anything! I may not be very smart, but I’ve still got some wits in me.」

Bydd said given his past as a conman, witty trickeries are up his alley. But this type of speech only baffles Myourmiles, who on the other hand…

「I’m really hopeless against your type. Right, the more the merrier. That includes those thugs, if they don’t have a way to make a living, they seem at least capable of being guards. I’ll bring them along.」

 

——As he says so, Bydd and the rest will be accompanying him. Next, Myourmiles——

「What do the rest of you think? This house is all yours if you like it!」

He asks his subordinates. Upon hearing this, they laugh in response.

「「「Please allow us to accompany you!」」」

All of these people were hand-trained by Myourmiles, they have no attachment to this kingdom and no hesitation. Having made that decision, they are left with tons of work to do. Myourmiles has gained the official recognition of this nation (Brumund) and is part of the Freedom Association. That’s why it is his freedom to leave this one for the next.

Myourmiles’s motto is 「To act as soon as the target is set」, but there are things that he has to resolve first. Remembering this, Myourmiles decides to ensure there is no potential trouble left behind. He turns to one of the subordinates who also wished to accompany him and happens to be the head of a small group[61] under him.

I hope to plan this thing right and have Rimuru-sama promote me… But I don’t want this to affect you all and give you guys a hard time.」

These are all courteous words, Myourmiles however has something else in mind. If he abandons this estate, he would lose his territory that he put so much effort into building in this country. That’s why he hopes to leave a few people behind so they can safeguard the base on this land where they can still operate freely. This lieutenant should be more than capable of handling it.

His name is Vasha. He is the son of Myourmiles’s close acquaintance, who was first sent to his shop in the hope of him learning things. The man was smart enough and Myourmiles appreciated him a lot too, giving him much care. But, the failure of Vacha’s family business has changed the situation. Since he then became homeless, he was officially hired by Myourmiles, making him a manager in his shop. Nowadays Vasha’s family all rely on the income he gets as manager, Myourmiles couldn’t bear to have him fall on hard times like this. That’s why he hopes to leave Vasha behind.

He is almost perfect when it comes to handling work. That’s why Myourmiles is convinced that it will be fine to hand this shop to him as well.

Perhaps it is because he is young and energetic, Vasha couldn’t accept it. Perhaps he wishes to gain more recognition from Myourmiles and so he couldn’t make up his mind to go independent.

 

Although how Vasha is acting is rather pleasing, Myourmiles does not think this should go on. Vasha won’t be able to stand on his own if this continues, Myourmiles will have to find a chance to let him go and now is the perfect opportunity.

「Vasha, I’m not your parents. I never mentioned giving you this shop, only managing it. Listen now, even with me gone, you cannot allow this shop to go bankrupt, do you understand? And then, in time you will buy this shop from me! First run this shop to prosperity and get your actual parents here one day.」

With a gentle smile on his face, Myourmiles puts his hand on Vasha’s shoulder. His words may have sounded kind, but he would make sure to sign the confirmation document and be very clear with the money. Myourmiles is a businessman after all. He is not that naive. With that being said however……

If he can’t even make enough money to afford purchasing this shop, this boy will not make it big in the future.

In another sense, he is also like a strict mentor.

Manager Vasha expresses his gratitude with tears in his eyes.

These types of words won’t get to Myourmile’s heart either way. He nods deeply after replying 「Good luck then!」

Soon afterwards, Myourmiles finished all of the procedures. After selecting who to bring and who should stay, he gives some final advice to Lieutenant Vasha.

「In case of any trouble, just come and discuss things with me. I have faith that you guys will be successful in running things right. You better not let me down!」

Vasha and the rest who are staying at the estate nod after hearing this. Myourmiles is thorough with his teaching, so no one would dare to be reckless. They wouldn’t go so far as to do something rude even against noblemen.

「Myourmiles-sama, everyone here was trained from start to finish by you. Please be reassured!」

Myourmiles nods after hearing Vasha’s guarantee.

「Heh, you sure talk the talk. But, there’s something you guys should know——」

「Hmm. I’ll be counting on you!」

Just in case, Myourmiles has made the deal beforehand that if there is ever any emergency use, they will focus on getting rid of (selling) their own merchandise first. He won’t get careless in that regards.

And Vasha isn’t hesitating either, his thoughts align with Myourmiles without word and he quickly came to realize it.

He’s still lacking something for now, but I can tell from his eyes, Vasha is already starting to be his own man… Then I can hand it to him with reassurance——Myourmiles thinks to himself.

And like that, Myourmiles has finished managing everything. With a group of followers, he sets off for Tempest Federation.
