Thanks to Vesta, the literacy rate here has increased across the board. But even in spite of that, not everyone is capable of reading, writing and counting. Our country will continue to grow in the future, so talented individuals such as Myourmiles are of great necessity. Rigurdo probably understands this as well and is not simply blindly tagging along with my proposal merely because I wished for it. That’s why he himself also supports Myourmiles’s appointment as an official of our nation. He’s likely aware of the short-coming of our countrymen when it comes to math. While it has nothing to do with our plan (festival), he still welcomes Myourmiles’s addition for that reason.

「——I see, that’s a great idea!」

 

「No no no, I’m not that good yet. But, I, Myourmiles, will do my best to fulfill my duty!」

Myourmiles responds humbly, but this man has always been ambitious. He joined the operation with intent from the start. If he makes the opening festival a success, Myourmiles’s dream of becoming an executive will surely come true.

   

「But, I will still need to show some results first, or else the others may not approve.」

「Indeed. Although if Rimuru-sama gives the order, everyone will obey regardless……」

「I don’t want to do that at all. Honestly, I think that I’ve been interfering too much in this whole thing already.」

「That’s right. A non-citizen of our nation becoming an executive, this matter alone will have a very good publicity effect. But in order to achieve that, Myourmiles-san has to make some outstanding achievement.」

「That’s right. Although I feel pretty bad asking so much from you, will you be willing to try to accomplish that, Myourmiles-kun?」

   

Indeed, that’s where the difficulties lie.

With the only criteria being capability, gaining approval from the monsters becomes a trivial task. Diablo is a good example of this. When he wanted to be my No.2 secretary, no one had any objections. More accurately speaking, Shion objected, but that was more because Shion is an airhead. Diablo’s strength is comparable to mine; that is an undoubted fact. No one dares to complain about the actions of such a dangerous person. That’s why for my military officers, as long as I’ve acknowledged them, they can become an executive. It’s all fair game as long as they are strong enough.

But, the same cannot be said for civil officials. They are supposed to be recruited through examinations, but sadly we have yet to develop to that stage. People with prior experience such as Vesta are obviously welcomed, but they will still need to show actual results. After all, even Vesta is still just a consultant, in other words, he is considered as a guest.

I’m thinking it is about time to promote Vesta to an executive too, but Myourmiles still needs to show some actual results. If possible, I hope to recruit them both as ministers into the national organizations that aim to update the structure of our kingdom.

Almost as if he’s trying to blow away our worries, Myourmiles is wearing a very confident smile. I don’t dislike this mischievous looking grin.

「Hehehe, Rimuru-sama. Please do not underestimate me. I, Myourmiles, promise that I will meet your expectations and complete the job successfully!」

Myourmiles, you are a truly reliable man. Your experience as a black market boss doesn’t seem to be for show. His thick-skinned attitude is really reassuring.

「Hehehe, Myourmiles-kun, of course I have faith in you. I’ll be counting on you then!」

 

「Although there may be failures along the way, I see that you still wish to boast about your future success. That being said, if you dare to betray Rimuru-sama’s expectations, my iron fists will not be generous with you.」

 

「Hold on hold on, Rigurdo-san? You can’t do that! Shouldn’t you be encouraging Myourmiles-kun to work hard?」

 

「Please be assured, I won’t leave any evidence——」

   

「Ah, geez, Rigurdo-san is so scary.」

「I’ll be counting on you then. I am really going to turn a blind eye to you.」

Although this is what we said, both of us have evil grins on our faces. Rigurdo is no stranger to Myourmiles, probably having long since accepted him. This fact alone is very comforting. At the end of the day, as long as everyone can accept Myourmiles, any justification goes.

And so we chatted amicably until the meeting concluded, with everyone leaving behind their closing thoughts. Afterwards, we began the preparation for the opening festival.

As such, the preparation work is proceeding bit by bit——

    ***

Fast forward to tonight.

「How is this possible…… How can this be?! This house is a thousand times more comfortable than the upper class inns found in the capital of Ingracia!」

Myourmiles exclaimed the moment he moved into the new estate.

It seems that he is very satisfied with his new home, which pleases me as well.

「There’s tap water, a Magic-powered stove, and a bathroom. There’s even a toilet[80] here! It’s like every single facility from all the classy inns is present here.」

Myourmiles is astounded after hearing the elated reports from his subordinates.

「Y-Young master…… Rimuru-sama? Is it really okay to be so extravagant?」

There’s no use asking me this, as this is the standard issue facility of this nation. But, since Myourmiles’s subordinates are staying at his place as well, his estate is a lot more luxurious than the average citizens’ indeed. I asked people to build a house with the same standards with references to the estate Myourmiles resided in Brumund Kingdom. There are around ten rooms in total and some of them come with mini kitchens and toilets. There’s also a large bathroom (bathhouse) and canteen for communal use. Structurally it should accommodate a large number of residents.

「Is there such a need? It is a lot cheaper than preparing a home for everyone after all. Those who want to own their own house should start saving up right now to buy one in the future.」

I can’t manage to prepare a home for everyone, so I’ve used the house exclusive to the executives instead. It’s great to see that everyone is satisfied. I’ll be covering the expenses, of course. I did this in consideration of the fact that Myourmiles-kun has assisted me in making profits, so surely we will continue to collaborate in the future as well.

With this in mind, I’ll just consider this a necessary expense. Compared to the potential profits, the cost of covering his housing is quite insignificant.

「I-I see…… In this kingdom, is this the standard issue? Then, do the cheap inns in the southwest area also have this standard?」

 

「They do. Although not every room has a bathroom, they are built with toilets. After all, there are large, cheap bath houses nearby. Some inns even have free-to-use bath houses.」

 

「I see…… I recall during the discussion at the start of all this, didn’t you mention that you intend to make this city a spa resort? Now I finally understand, Not only are these amenities exclusive to the wealthy, but even the inn service for commoners has reached this level. It’s no wonder why the adventurers keep coming back.」

「Isn’t this living environment too comfortable?」

「That’s not just comfortable, compared to the entire western continent, the lodging here is the pinnacle of luxury. Now with a stable income from adventurers, this country surely will prosper as time goes on——」

「Hmmhmm.」

「——! I get it now, so that’s what this is about, Rimuru-sama!」

Huh, what do you mean?

Myourmiles shouts excitedly, completely ignoring me who seems to be out of the loop with the whole ordeal.

「That’s why you are building the underground labyrinth! As expected of Rimuru-sama, I am completely vanquished against your peerless intellect.」

「Oh, oh ho, yeah that’s right.」

What are you on about?

「Adventurers will come to hunt the monsters that spawn in the labyrinth. I originally thought that you were doing this to give them relief after they’ve lost their jobs as the Jura Great Forest became safe…… Ah, how impressive, I’ve not expected you to think so far——」

Giving relief? What now?

Hold on, the monsters in the Jura Great Forest did decrease but…… The underground labyrinth is just intended to be a purely recreational facility——

「That will work, that will definitely work! Because of the declining number of monsters, adventurers who are already having trouble making a living will be out of the market. As a result, there are probably people who will choose the underground labyrinth as an occupation. We can also sell equipment and healing potions as such. We will not only be able to make this a health resort for tourism, but some may even start settling down in this nation. All the inns provide wonderful services and there’s also the tourist attraction of the colosseum. In addition to meeting the demands for recreational and occupational needs……」

 

I mean——Is this the purpose of building the labyrinth?

I do intend to buy up the items that the adventurers collect, but that is essentially somewhat similar to buying back the little trinkets you earn in a carnival game[81]——But, some of what Myourmiles is saying is indeed worth considering.

「You've only just arrived today, yet you already have such a solid grasp on the situation, Myourmiles-kun?」

「That is only natural. I’m confident that my ability to sense business opportunities will not lose to you.」

「Hehehe, I have truly been defeated, Myourmiles-kun.」

「Hahaha, surely you jest. It is all thanks to young master that I am like this.」

 

「I’m not as confident in taking care of all this alone, that's why I wanted to have you handle the project——」

「Oh oh, is that true? I’m happy to help.」

The plan to turn the underground labyrinth into a workplace for the adventurers——Myourmiles joyfully accepts. He now has a huge workload on his shoulders, but man is he energetic. How capable.

I had never considered the possibility of having adventurers settle down here until Myourmiles pointed it out. While some people might think they can earn a profit through the labyrinth, most will just spend their money and leave——This recreational facility has somewhat of a gambling factor.

I see, so the idea is to have the adventurers settle down and let them hunt the monsters in the labyrinth. Myourmiles sure is astute, and he has an interesting way of looking at things.

Unlike the animal inhabitants, having the adventurers stay here will not disturb the ecosystem of the forest. In fact, we do need their help to clear the labyrinth before the monsters start running rampant. It will also give us time to buy and prepare the necessary ingredients. There is no issue with the replenishment of magicules with Veldora present. In other words, the monsters will start to gradually fill in.

This may turn out to be an amazing project. Adventurers will earn some money first before spending it in the town. Not only would we be able to line our own pockets, but we will also be able to support the adventurers.

The bought back materials can then be processed and exported to other countries. As for the「Magic Ores」, we may even export them directly. We might need some of the 「Magic Ores」, so we don’t really need to export them all at once. Moreover, (it may help that) the Freedom Association will come to set up a branch in our nation. When that time comes, to avoid cut-throat competition, we’ll need to loosen our stranglehold to prevent boycott. If the (freedom) association would pay the adventurers, it will help us to acquire foreign goods.

We will then use that money to import things from abroad. Right now our trade relations with the Beast Kingdom Yuuazarina are on hold, and with the vegetables and grains produced in our nation alone, we won’t be able to feed the numerous adventures either. That’s why we'll need to import things from other countries. Even if that’s not the case, it will still be fine as I plan to turn my kingdom into a trading powerhouse. We’ll stick to the plan this time around, but I still have to figure out ways to transport more goods per run.

Given that is the case, I’ve formed a rough outline. I’ve had a plan in mind to increase the width of the road. The roads were only half paved, with the other half still having exposed dirt. I plan to fit train tracks on the unfinished half so we can run cargo trains on them.

「The only thing left now is the promotional work.」

I was lost in my own visions of grandeur when Myourmiles’s words brought me back to my senses.

Oh yeah, there’s no use in rushing things now.

Putting aside the train tracks, simply developing trains will already take some time. However, we first need to commence the opening festival successfully to leave a good impression on the other nations.

「This isn't enough to be called a promotion, but I’ve sent invitations to several heads of nations. Some reporters from varying countries have also agreed to help, so I figure that we will get plenty of guests——」

「Hmm. As expected of Rimuru-sama. If we are arranging the transportation of the royalties and nobles, we should do that before the snow melts, which is now. It seems that I don’t have to worry about that anymore. Then, let me get in touch with some other renowned merchants to inform them about the festival being held in this nation.」

「Can I trouble you to do that?」

「Just count on me. I’ve actually already made some preparations. I wanted to check out the condition of this nation first before confirming whether I should do so or not.」

 

Myourmiles cracks a smile as he replies.

I knew I could count on him.

「Ah, Myourmiles-kun is too amazing. Your shrewdness always impresses me.」

「You’re flattering me. It is Rimuru-sama who deserves these praises. Compared to how much of a visionary you are, my skills are nothing.」

We exchange looks, smiling..

No no no, Myourmiles-kun’s cunning mind is the actual thing that none can rival.

As I thought that——

「Rimuru-sama, this plan will not fail. With all these amazing conditions in our favor, success is all but guaranteed!」

 

Myourmiles proclaims with a serious expression.

Overconfidence is a common fatal flaw, but hearing it from him makes me feel reassured. Myourmiles seems to have also been attracted by the food, environment and comfort of this town. That's the reason why he reacted that way. It's like foreshadowing the success of our plan.

I stood up and extended my hand towards Myourmiles.

「I’ll be counting on you, Myourmiles-kun.」

「Leave it to me——」

 

Myourmiles reaches out and clasps both of my hands, giving me his solemn oath.

While secretly praising him, I have faith that the plan will be a success.

    ***

That night, I was invited to dine at Myourmiles’s estate.

After the meal, Myourmiles and I enjoyed a bit of leisure time while drinking red tea. It was then that Myourmiles gave his men the order to bring some people in. The ones who arrived are Bydd and Gobuemon.

Considering Gobuemon’s personality, he should still be carrying out his bodyguard duty while keeping Myourmiles in the dark. So why did he come here? Does it mean that he is reporting directly to Myourmiles now?

 

Disregarding that, a more pressing issue has become apparent.

「Rimuru-sama, speaking of this Gobuemon-dono here, he seems to be a bodyguard you sent.」

I was going to play dumb, but it seems that Myourmiles has already figured out my little scheme involving Gobuemon.

「That’s true, but let’s put that aside for now, Gobuemon, what happened to your arm?」

Since the cat’s out of the bag, I decided to instead focus on what actually concerned me.

It is about Gobuemon’s right arm: all of it below the elbow is gone.

「R-Rimuru-sama! I-I’m truly……. Truly sorry. It was all my fault for being reckless and getting discovered by Myourmiles. This lost arm is the punishment for my foolishness.」

As he finished, Gobuemon got on his knees to beg for forgiveness. I was at a complete loss until Myourmiles came forth to help mediate.

「D-Don’t get so emotional, Gobuemon-dono. Please get up and have a cup of tea to calm down.」

Myourmiles had Gobuemon sit on a chair and had his men serve the prepared tea. After Gobuemon regained his composure, he began to elaborate.

According to Myourmiles, he seemed to have been assaulted several times after our meeting. Myourmiles is no fool, so he gave orders to his own bodyguards such as Bydd to remain alert. But in the face of several crises, they were only able to avoid them with the help of a secret guardian——Gobuemon of course——who intervened.

The ambushes were more frequent than I imagined, so they were able to deduce that someone had been secretly protecting them. From there, they were able to figure out that the only one who could be responsible was me which is why Myourmiles pretended that he hadn’t discovered Gobuemon.

But he didn’t expect a key event that took place later on. In an act of vengeance, Viscount Kazak decided to resort to outrageous violence.

「I found someone to inherit the store in that nation (Brumund) and came here straight away. I was thinking that we would be safe once we got on the road, where the attackers wouldn’t be able to strike as easily. We thus lowered our guards, but I didn’t expect——」

The roads are overseen by patrols and there are many other merchants as well as adventurers around. To avoid accumulating snow, the street is also cleaned everyday, letting people travel on it even during winter days. There shouldn’t be an assault incident on such crowded streets and even if there were one, the patrols would hurry over. Myourmiles was very aware of that after travelling on the road several times before.

For this reason, he lowered his guard, and as a result he was taken by surprise. He was ambushed at the corner of a street in a certain town.

「Village? Was it the one Bydd tried to con——Was it the village where Bydd and I first met each other?」

「R-Right! That was the village Rimuru-sama and I first met!」

About Bydd... he is now Myourmiles’s bodyguard, but during our first encounter, he was still a conman committing frauds. It’s probably not appropriate right now to bring these things up from the past, so I’ll just brush it off.

Bydd came to our side while helping to steady Gobuemon. He then stood directly behind Myourmiles to eavesdrop on our conversation. After listening to our conversation, Bydd realized he had something to add. It was reported that a black carriage carrying a swarm of aggressive, Rank B monsters appeared out of nowhere.

Bydd, who was originally Rank C, and his companions were no match for those monsters Each of them was prepared to make his last stand. With that being said, they still tried their best to assist the villagers in taking shelter and buying time.

It was then that Gobuemon showed up.

「It was then that brother (aniki) Gobuemon saved us!」

「That’s right, Not just me, everyone back at the scene is grateful towards Gobuemon-san.」

Bydd and Myourmiles commented, but Gobuemon still looks dejected.

   

「But, it’s still an undeniable fact that I’ve failed——」

 

There’s no way that Gobeumon would have lost to those monsters. He took care of them in an instant. He was going to pursue the culprit afterwards, but it was then that a wild Rank B+ Basilisk appeared. Gobuemon’s right arm was caught in the spray of the petrifying gas, he was forced to immediately perform an amputation at the elbow.

The black carriage escaped during that interval.

 

「So the failure you were referring to was that you let the culprit flee?」

 

「That’s part of it, the other being that Myourmiles discovered me……」

Huh, so that’s the failure you were talking about?

「It’s really no big deal if you were discovered really. The bodyguarding was your main task. By the way, you should hurry and heal up your arm.」

As I finish, I took out the healing potion from 「Stomach」with the intention of giving it to Gobuemon. Yet he bit his lips, unwilling to accept it.

「No, it was all because of my immaturity that I was injured. I wasn’t able to defeat the Basilisk on my own; it was with the help of Bydd and the rest that it was defeated. It was too embarrassing. And even though leaving me with one hand is inconvenient, it will regenerate over time anyway…….」

Gobuemon is very stubborn, or rather he is very prideful and relies too much on his own strength.

「Gobuemon, do you think that it was shameful to ask for help from Bydd and the others?」

「I-I guess……. It was my mission to be their bodyguard, yet I put the people I was guarding in crisis——」

「Hold on, Gobuemon. You’ve got the wrong idea.」

「Did I get the wrong idea?」

「Yes. You’ve gone too far playing the lone ranger. That is where you and Gobta are different.」

The difference between Gobuemon and Gobta is as simple as that one sentence suggests: the ability each person has to cooperate alongside their subordinates well.

Gobta won’t take on all the duties by himself. Even when against powerful monsters, he will order his subordinates to have everyone fight together. During simpler missions, it will appear that he is skipping duty and not doing much at all, and honestly, he really does slack off a lot, doesn’t he…… Yet considering the growth of his subordinates, Benimaru thinks that the way Gobta commands his men is superior.

   

If it were Gobuemon encountering a powerful monster, he would probably attack alone to get all of the spotlight, most likely because he is confident in his strength. Although Gobuemon has his reason for doing that, taking action alone won’t help his men grow. Moreover, if Gobuemon were defeated…… it would probably be impossible to retreat relying on his subordinates alone. It may even lead to their total demise. It is for this reason that Benimaru favors Gobta’s style.

And that’s also why I hope that Gobuemon would learn to trust his companions more. Myourmiles is a man who excels at leadership. I hoped whole-heartedly that Gobuemon would see him as a role model.

「——That’s why you should learn the importance of teamwork.With that being said, this is not me forcing you to do something with your companions, but to reserve your strength at times and only strike during times of crisis.」

   

「I…I……」

 

「You are strong, everyone would agree to that. But, strength alone is not enough for me to hand an entire army to you.」

「...........」

Gobuemon seems frustrated after hearing my explanation. I toss the healing potion at him as I saw this.

   

「Ah!」

Gobuemon’s right arm started to regenerate immediately.

 

「Gobuemon, you should stay in Myourmiles’s care for now. Whether you decide to train Bydd and his men over there or just chill around, either is fine. In this town, Myourmiles doesn’t need a bodyguard, so you should face your inner demons first.」

   

「Y-Your highness——」

「At the end of the day, you will amount to nothing by fighting alone! You must have also learnt that from your failures this time. When you put your mind to it, I’m sure that you will know what to do next.」

As I say that, I smiled towards Gobuemon. I then draw out the tachi on my belt and hand it over to him.

His eyes are wide open, yet he can’t believe what he is seeing.

「My gift for you.」

「B-But…… My mission……」

「Didn’t you bring Myourmiles-kun here safely? Moreover, I hope that you will improve yourself in the future. So consider this sword to be a mirror that casts light over your heart so you can reflect on yourself every night.」

If Gobuemon can let go of his ego and arrogance, he will definitely grow to become more reliable.

 

「I understand! I, Gobuemon, will definitely live up to your highness Rimuru’s expectations!」

Gobuemon’s eyes burn with passion. He is already very ambitious and will quickly grow after setting goals. I’m confident that he won’t disappoint me.

   

「Then, Myourmiles-kun, is it okay that I entrust Gobuemon to you?」

「Hahaha, no problem at all. I was going to ask the favour from you anyway. Alright Bydd, now Rimuru-sama has given the green light as you had wished. Gobuemon-dono will be training you guys.」

Myourmiles agrees as well, although it was after the decision was made. It seems that Bydd and his men are all very welcoming of Gobuemon. And just like that, Gobuemon has now become a guest in Myourmiles’s care and is free to act on his own will from now on.

   

After leaving Myourmiles’s estate, I lifted my head to gaze at the night sky. The constellations of the winter season shine brightly above, their locations seem different from what they were on earth.

I’m still somewhat wary of the incident with the ambusher. Was the culprit really Viscount Kazak?

He is merely a noble of the rank of viscount, so is it even possible that he has enough status and power to prepare several monsters for an ambush? Moreover, while it’s one thing to control rank B monsters, controlling a rank B+ monster is a completely different matter. Only extremely wealthy people from large nations can tame these monsters——Wait… hold on… Can you even purchase a Rank B+ monster with money?

 

《Answer. Previously Rank A- Summoner 「Ziegis」 was able to summon a Rank B+ lesser demon. It would not be unthinkable that someone has domesticated a Basilisk.》

Oh yeah, it wouldn’t be that hard with 「Summon Magic」. It would certainly be a lot faster than using carriage to transport monsters.

But under these circumstances…… There’s the「Barrier」 Shuna set up to interfere with magic... which the roads just so happen to be lacking.

「I should order people to tighten security…….」

I muttered as I left the scene.

The citizens of Tempest quickly welcomed Myourmiles with open arms.

I’ve already introduced (mentioned) him to the executives, and Rigurdo will be responsible for informing the rest. With that being said however, the progress has been surprisingly smooth.

Myourmiles handled his work flawlessly. He has already become familiar with the subordinates I gave him in a blink of an eye,appropriately delegating work to all of them regardless of race.This also includes Myourmiles’s original followers, which immediately created a brand new organization.

 

A competent man sure does things differently. Even though he is tasked with so many different jobs, Myourmiles is still full of energy.

Apart from running the new organization, he has also utilized his own network to send out invitations to some influential figures. For instance, powerful nobles from landlocked countries and affluent merchants from all the large cities. There are also powerful figures from the capital of Ingracia, etc.

It seems that the nation-founding festival that we planned to hold after the snow melts is going to be larger in scale than we imagined. And of course, we haven’t been idling on these projects. We’ve been rehearsing for the plays that will be screened at the opera house, establishing the rules and procedures of the martial tournament, discussing the entry fee for the underground labyrinth, and calculating the prices of all sorts of goods found in the labyrinth. Moreover, we’re also keeping tabs on the importation of marketable goods, as well as how we’re going to sell them. This doesn’t seem like a first time operation at all with how smoothly Myourmiles is handling it.

I had also introduced him to Veldora. Regarding the matter of opening up the Teppan-yaki shop, Myourmiles was also willing to act as his consultant.

I made the right choice.

Among all the ideas that I came up with, it would seem that the appointment of Myourmiles has been my best decision yet.Without his help, these plans would most likely have ended in failure.

Just us alone would not have been sufficient to properly handle it.

To have met him under some miraculous twist of fate, how lucky of me.

I admire Myourmiles at work with delight.

    ***

Time passes fast.

The whole town is teeming with an atmosphere of festivity, full of enthusiasm and energy.

The construction plan of the colosseum is proceeding without a hitch as well, in part due to Gobkyu’s leadership skills.. In addition, the youngest of the three dwarf brothers, Myrd has returned from his vacation to help modify my blueprints. Thanks to his talent and input, the colosseum has become a gorgeous building of great artistic value.

As expected from a true artist, I am truly impressed. I personally was never really gifted in the art department, so he was a huge help. The end product will definitely be enough to even satisfy royalty. Regarding the additional parts Myrd added, we’ll have it all done by the time the martial tournament starts.

Moreover, Myourmiles’s subordinates are attempting to set up stores using the hard-working citizens as their practice customers. That’s going smoothly as well, and business seems finer than ever.

Things should be fine then. Both me and Myourmiles are relieved.

The underground labyrinth is handed over to Ramiris and Veldora. While I want to work on that too, I frankly don’t have the time.

To celebrate my inauguration——or just to check out who I really am, the representatives of the tribes in the Jura Great Forest began to gradually gather at this town.

Their goal is to pledge loyalty to the 「Demon Lord」 and stand under my protection. However, if they discover that the Demon Lord doesn’t really have any real power, they would immediately bare their fangs and rebel. Staying by the side of a Demon Lord without power will not only do them no good, but it may even lead to their quick demise. As such, it is only natural to take the necessary actions to avoid such a reality.

Until now Jura Great Forest has always been under the protection of of Veldora. This inviolable domain has now come to be ruled by a new demon Lord. Moreover, this Demon Lord has just come to power, so it is still a mystery as to what central ideology he upholds. This is the reason why the representatives of the tribes feel unease.

——And that’s how things are as of now.

Today, I am dressed in formal attire and put on an altar to be worshiped.

I’m in my slime form, treated no different than a decorative ornament. It feels like I've become kagami mochi[82] offered on an altar. Can’t we just put my clone on it? I tried to suggest this and everyone shot me down with a smile. Times like these are when the executives are especially united. They’ve probably made the decision behind my back using 「Telepathy Net」.

I was helplessly toyed by them, and as a result I’ve been so weighed down with decorations that I’m basically immobile. They’ve even specially prepared clothes (for slimes) on this day, to which all I can do is feel dumbfounded.

Not only that, but they’ve also prepared several different types of outfits for each day.In the worst case scenario, they would be changing my outfit every morning, noon and night. I really hope that they will show some restraints, but these people claim that it is vital to make me look majestic…… In other words, they are basically saying that the natural me——in slime form——has no majesty at all.

Right, never mind then.

As for the people attending the reception ceremony, everyone will be dressed like guards of honour. They will all be fully armed, and unlike when they wear their normal clothes, their current attire holds an air of prestige. Under this solemn atmosphere, Rigurdo and Rigur, who are dressed in formal attire, are receiving the guests.

They told me that all I need to do is remain silent and gaze down at the envoys. Since the magic (of my appearance) will be broken once I speak, this suggestion is most appreciated.

Benimaru and Shuna flank my left and right sides respectively. Behind me, Shion, Souei, and Gabil stand in lines. Ranga is lurking in my shadow as always. On the right lane are the one hundred members of the goblin riders led by Gobta. On the left lane are the one hundred high ranked members of the 「Kurenai」 led by Gobua. The remaining two hundred lower ranked members are responsible for maintaining the security of the street. They are more fierce than the average security force, so even when encountering suspicious individuals, they should be able to handle it themselves. And in the town, Shion’s 「Yomigaeri」 are patrolling undercovered in disguise. Even if someone starts a commotion there, they can respond to it before the situation spirals out of control.

On another note, Diablo and Hakurou have still yet to return from Farmus.

According to the ones that have returned first, namely Gobta, Ranga, Gabil, the two will be finishing their work at hand before the opening festival. They seem to express regret at the fact that they won’t have a chance to see me in my “majestic” outfit. But they do have things to deal with on their side too, since Youmu is soon going to be crowned. Once that happens the Kingdom name of Farmus will also disappear, and in its place a new kingdom will be born. That’s why they seem to be preoccupied with preparation work, so their inability to return is reasonable. Even Diablo has been so busy that he's rarely shown up lately. As for Hakurou, since he doesn’t have the skill 「Dimensional Transportation」, I haven’t been able to see him for a while either. When the two return, I shall make sure to reward them properly.

I’m not the only one who has been working hard. Although my current state is extremely embarrassing, I’ll have to endure it. I got the feeling that I should finish this reception ceremony as soon as possible.

The most interesting thing honestly has been the reaction of the different tribes.

While I serve the role as a very “competent” decorative object with nothing else to do, I focused on observing the monsters coming to greet me——There are three types of reactions they are giving.

Reverence, observation and fear.

In addition, among the people who are observing me, some even seem to look down on us. It is an attitude often displayed by the new-comers from the opposite side of the Ameld River. It’s not that big of a deal, and as long as I can show my strength, they will surely submit on the spot.

The problem lies with those who are afraid……

Right before me are people from a certain weak tribe whose expressions are filled with fear——The Rabbitman tribe. They are cute looking demi-humans whose appearances closely resemble that of a humans’, with the exception of their elongated, rabbit - like ears. Unlike the beastmen, the rabbitmen are an inferior species that can’t use 「Transformation」. Their strength is no different from that of an average human, and judging from their equipment, they may even be considered weaker. But they’ve still somehow managed to survive in the Jura Great Forest. It seems that their 「Danger Perception」 has been greatly enhanced, which is probably the reason why they weren’t fooled by my appearance.

Dealing with people who fear me is quite difficult. Some are even panicking. The priority here should be to calm them down first.

「T-Today…… a-an honor to be invited——」

It seems that they’re so nervous as to be unable to speak properly..

「It’s fine. I permit you to meet with our ruler, the great Demon Lord Rimuru-sama. Please raise your head!」

Rigurdo spoke up, yet the rabbitman representative remains unresponsive. Actually, he doesn’t seem to be moving at all. Even with my cute slime appearance, he still doesn’t dare to raise his head to look at me. Meh. But I guess it’s true that he can’t make eye contact with me anyways since I don’t have any in the first place.

Uh, maybe I’m stretching the topic. I don’t intend to rule over others with fear, so I hope this misunderstanding can be resolved…… However, to these people, the whole「This Demon Lord looks pretty weak」—— is probably setting off every single one of their danger alarms.

So this is the so called fear due to Gap Moe[83]. Simply getting them to agree to cooperate with us on maintaining their domain and sharing their culture took quite a lot of effort. While this cooperation might be a little forced, I hope that in the future they will come to trust us.

When the Federation was first formed, we had to deal with something similar with the halfling and kobold (doghead race) tribes. When I allowed the kobold tribe to travel and do business with us, they began trusting us. Nowadays, their representative Kobe[84] has become a steadfast comrade, and we often exchange profitable trade information.

Whether it’s this rabbitmen tribe or other weaker tribes——I will declare that all are equal under my rule. I don’t want to imitate other Demon Lords and their philosophy of might makes right. I’ll have to repeatedly bring up this point to hammer it in. It will be difficult to gain their trust immediately, but that will be a task for the future.

It seems that I’ve gotten lost in my thoughts while staring at their rabbit ears. The rabbitmen right now are all groveling on their knees with their heads bowed.

「There’s no need to be afraid. Rimuru-sama is a man of leniency. He has said that all is equal for those who are willing to pledge their loyalty. You can greet him with ease of mind.」

After Rigurdo said that, the representative is finally willing to lift up his face.

He seems quite young and has a handsome appearance, but dark circles hang under his eyes. Is it because he is working too hard or is it because he is too nervous……

「G-Great Demon Lord Rimuru-sama, please grant us rabbitmen the permission to pledge our loyalty to you——」

I nod with a 「Hmm」 as he finishes.

My reaction seemed to have eased their tension a bit; the young man’s shoulders visibly sagged in relief.

「I’ve told you just now, there’s no need to be so nervous.」

「Y-Yes sir! I-In fact, I brought my daughter here too, but she was too excited when she reached the town, and by the time I realized it I’d already lost track of her……」(Gained Item: Spoiler-free ticket to read Mamono no Kuni no Arukikata, just kidding, keep reading the LN, no, don’t leave, please.)

「Hahaha, our town right now is alive and brimming with an atmosphere of festivity.. She’s a young lady after all, so her curiosity is only natural.」

「Ahh, this is too embarrassing. My daughter is always giving me a headache as she would run off to different places as soon as I stopped paying attention. I was afraid that she would be an eyesore to your highness Rimuru so I wanted to keep her at the village, but she kept begging me to bring her along……」

 

The tribe chief, who is also the representative, must be very concerned about the disappearance of his daughter. Although she won’t run into any trouble in this town, he still seems to be very worried. I feel somewhat reassured to learn that I was not the source of his fear. I don’t want any weak tribes to be fearful of me anymore.

By the way, a rabbitman lady… Bishoujo (beautiful girl) with rabbit ears… I’ve got to meet her sometime.

While contemplating about the issue, I accidentally let out some of my genuine thoughts.

「Since she is so naturally curious, wouldn’t she also be able to adapt to times of turbulence and change as well? She seems to show promise in growing to be a reliable successor.」

Due to the fact that I personally spoke to him, the rabbitman representative looks deeply moved.

「Thank you for your gracious kindness. If such a chance emerges next time, allow me to introduce my daughter Flamaire[85] to you.」

The chief bows his head, which seems to indicate that the awkward situation has been resolved. Afterwards, Rigurdo went through some rough explanations on how things would work before the rabbitman tribe come to officially pledge allegiance to me.

The chief bows to me several times before he and his men departed off into the distance. By the looks of it, he will also inform the other tribes that I am no fearsome Demon Lord.

 

After being guided out, the next batch of visitors arrive.

I turn to face the monsters who are kneeling before me, requesting a meeting. Among them is a familiar face——Gabil’s father—— lizardman tribe leader Abil.  Rather than feeling nostalgic, I get the feeling that he’s a completely different person.

Abil now looks like a warrior in the prime of his youth with a face full of energy. By the looks of it, due to me 「Naming」 him, Abil evolved. He has now evolved to a Dragonewt that more closely resembles a human in appearance——But speaking of which, Gabil’s appearance never experienced such a drastic change. His sister Souka evolved to obtain a human form too, so I think it may have to do with human will.

「Long time no see, Rimuru-sama. It is an occasion truly worth celebrating now that you’ve become a Demon Lord, I——No, we also……」

Abil’s body tenses up due to nervousness. This must be the feeling that comes from deep reverence. Just as Gabil had mentioned before, Demon Lords are fearsome existences to both men and monsters. However, despite knowing my personality, he’s still reacting this way……

That’s why I decided to say something to break the ice.

「Ah, long time no see, chief. You don’t have to be so tense. We are all good pals within the federation after all, so I look forward to your guidance in the future as well.」

 

Benimaru gives off a dry smile while Shuna lets out an exasperated sigh, however, I don’t really mind.

「No, that can’t be right. Right now Rimuru-sama has become a Demon Lord, so things are totally different. As long as you are our leader, you are in effect the dominator of the Jura Great Forest……」

Abil is still the same as always, so serious all the time.

But that’s also why he’s so likable.

「Ah, it’s alright. There’s no other tribe present here, so you don’t have to be so stiff. Chief, your son Gabil has been working hard under me. He’s now an official and plays an integral part in our community.」

I decide to bring up Gabil’s name so Abil won’t feel the need to be so tense.

I also emphasize on the parent-child relationship between Abil and Gabil, hinting that it’s time for him to make amends with Gabili.

「Geez, seriously. I’ve been defeated, Rimuru-sama. Gabil, that kid…… Has my son been of service to you? He really is my hopeless, silly son……」

Abil nods with gratitude, seemingly sensing my intention. On the surface, Gabil and Abil have cut ties with each other. Since Abil thinks he shouldn’t publicly display concern about Gabil’s wellbeing, he didn’t bring that topic up.

However, once I started it, he no longer felt reservations and continued the conversation. It seems like he’s finally eased into it, once again displaying his heroic characteristics.

「Not at all. He is now working very hard and is in charge of the entire research department. Ain’t that right, Gabil?」

「Huh? Ah, yeah——!」

During my conversation with Abil, Gabil has been frozen up on the side this entire time without saying a word. He seems embarrassed to the point where even his ears are blushing red. His voice even jumped up a pitch after I called him out.

「This silly boy…...」

While ignoring the panicked Gabil, I let a little bit of my 「Demon Lord Haki」leak out. This act alone turned the atmosphere solemn.

「Leader of the Lizardman tribe, Abil, I hope you will assist me, the Demon Lord, as a member of the federation.」

「Understood! I swear by my 『Name』 that I shall pledge my eternal loyalty to Rimuru-sama!」

Abil got down onto his knees and bowed, declaring his loyalty with conviction. The way he made his declaration was quite warrior like, resulting in a glorious display. I nodded towards him as my gaze fell onto Gabil, who is still in a state of panic.

「——Uh!」

Gabil sure is slow. Apparently he didn’t understand what my glance meant. But slimes don’t even have eyes——though that is probably not the reason.

Rigurdo, who can no longer bear to watch, made a move as he whispered to Gabil:

「Rimuru-sama hopes that you and your father can have a good chat together to close the gap between you two. If you don't take this chance right now to mend your relationship, opportunities are going to be hard to come by in the future. Moreover, Abil-dono will be put in a difficult spot if he has severed ties with an executive——」

Rigurdo knows his stuff, alright. Unlike Gabil, he has completely understood the meaning behind my words. After Rigurdo pointed this out, Gabil seemed to have finally understood the situation. He hurriedly bows and accompanies Abil in leaving our location.

 

Next in line are the chiefs of each High Orc clan who came to greet me with several subordinates. They must have put a lot of faith in us seeing that they didn’t even bring any guards.

The subordinates are their children. The improvement in the food shortage situation is only natural, and even their lives as a whole have been improved.

The most important thing (for them) is the birth of new children. Rumour has it that the fact that the new-borns were also High Orcs (upon birth) gave them a pleasant surprise, which is why they decided to report this to me in person.

Isn’t it normal for the High Orcs to have High Orc children? I thought so too, but it turns out to not be the case. Under normal circumstances, the High Orcs will only give birth to regular Orc children; the mutation is only limited to one generation. Due to the declining birth rate, they must be putting more effort into raising their young. I hope that this is indeed the case as more children will lead to more future labour for our nation.

Children are precious. Even in a different world, with a different race, this is still the unwavering truth. I was somewhat worried about the name inheritance, but it sounds like things went surprisingly well. Even though the names I gave them are randomly made up, and they have now gotten a bit complex…… But they seem to think that those types of names are quite common.

Wonderful, wonderful.

While I believe that this is the case, it may just be that they’ve gotten used to their names. After being addressed by these names all the time, it naturally became the norm. They’ve never had a problem with being unnamed in the past, so it seems like I was worrying too much.

I heave a sigh of relief and ended the reception ceremony with the High Orcs.

   

Finally the last group of people for today. Apart from the Lizardman and High Orcs, there’s one last major faction of the Jura Great Forest left——The Treants[86] have also come to greet me.

With that being said however, the only people who are actually here are Treyni-san’s two sisters, the Dryad Trya and Doris. But since the Treant are immobile, this can’t really be helped. Moreover, the Dryads are the representatives of Tree People anyways, so it doesn’t really matter that they aren’t here.

Speaking of the tribe of the Treant, I often visit the place since Zegion and Apito guard the tribe. Not only do they guard the tribe, but they also deliver high quality honey to me. It’s probably due to these reasons that the reception atmosphere is pretty relaxed.

「It’s been a while, Rimuru-sama. We’ve come to congratulate you on your inauguration as Demon Lord.」

「Please continue to protect us in the future.」

The two aren’t holding back either as they greet me with all smiles. This is good for me as well. We began to chat about our recent conditions, and so far there don’t seem to be any major problems at hand. If anything, the magicule density in the Jura Great Forest has gotten thinner, and as a result, movement has become somewhat more inconvenient.

It’s as if the two are made from the same mold that birthed Treyni-san. They give off the usual aura of an abundance of powerful mana. But the reduction of magicule concentration does still have an effect on them. In fact, the body of this Doris in front of me has become more transparent.

「I see... that part is my miscalculation. It’s probably because of the 『Barrier』 applied on the roads. I gotta figure out a solution……」

「Ah, it’s fine. It’s not that big of a deal.」

「It’s just that us sisters are affected because we utilize 『Magic Body (魔体)』 made by magicule that are susceptible to environmental changes.」

「Speaking of which, Rimuru-sama——」

「We have some urgent matters!」

They claim that the reduction in magicule concentration is nothing significant.

Monsters being affected by the thinning of magicule density is very rare, but the Dryads, who feed off magicules, mainly have their lives tied to the Treants. Since they are the last group of people I planned to meet for the day, I decided on a change of venue to continue our discussion.

I arranged another place to meet them that evening..

    ………………

    …………

    ……

It’s night time, and as soon as I enter the room——

「The thing that we really wanted to discuss was——」

 

「We want to follow nee-san’s footsteps to serve the beautiful fairy queen.」

The two spoke at the same time. At this point, what’s more on my mind is the title 「Fairy Queen」. That’s quite the dramatic name that doesn’t suit that chibi at all. Also, the term beautiful is just……

Ramiris’s innocent smile crosses my mind. No way; there’s no such thing.

My impression of her (compared to those two) couldn’t be more different; that I am absolutely certain of. If Ramiris is considered beautiful, then my appearance that resembles Shizu-san can only be described as godly. Even though I’ve begun to get used to looking at it lately, I still occasionally get mesmerized when I look at myself.

Not only me, but Benimaru and Shion by my side also share the same sentiments. However, Trya and Doris don’t seem to care at all.

「It isn’t just our hope, it’s what all the treants desire as well.」

「We heard that this town——」

「Ramiris-sama has moved and settled here.」

「If that’s the case, we hope to contribute our fair share of effort in serving her highness…….」

The two talk in turns, either about following my leadership or about serving Ramiris. How can I take these people as subordinates when they’re shouting about pledging loyalty to someone else? Seriously. Well, I guess since their sister Treyni-san is already serving Ramiris, I don’t really have any reason to object.

「Then, would you guys want to ask her directly in person?」

「——EH?」

「Can we really?」

The two reacted quite enthusiastically.

As such, we walk together to where Ramiris is. Beretta is working quietly on something while Treyni-san is busy tending to Ramiris. Ah, Beretta seems to be buried in a mountain of work.

I think to myself, while on the other hand——

「AH! Ramiris-sama is indeed beautiful——」

「She is beautiful and noble as always. There is indeed no other who can be our master!」

They were just like this before, and as soon as they saw Ramiris, Trya and Doris went full fangirl and began to cry out (out of excitement).

Treyni-san sees this and nods in acknowledgement. Who are these people talking about? I’m completely baffled. Especially the part about “noble quality”.  Because no matter how you put it, Ramiris seems to be quite lacking in that regard.

「Did you hear that? Hey! I’m talking to you, you know! Didn’t you hear what they just said? Are you going to see me in a different light now?」

I see that Ramiris is once being cocky and acting boastful.

How troublesome. She’s even flying around me looking all delighted, almost as if saying 「How ’bout that!」

Never mind, I don’t wanna deal with her anyways. It is indeed something to be happy about when you get praised… but she’s seriously taking it way too far.

「How do you see it, Ramiris? Not only these two, but the entire tribe of Treants wishes to serve you!」

 

「Uhmm, but……」

She seems to be aware that she is a guest who’s just temporarily staying here as she looks around, indecisive. That’s why I decided to lend her a hand.

「How about moving them into your labyrinth? Since you could move the shelter of the Beastmen with ease, surely it’ll be a piece of cake to move the Treant tribe, right?」

Or perhaps it’s too hard due to the distance involved? But I recall that she mentioned something about the labyrinth being connected to all parts of the world……

「Can I? Then we’ll have them move in tomorrow! With the power of my mentor, expansion of the labyrinth is super easy! I feel like my power has increased as well. There are still empty floors right now, so perhaps it’ll be a great idea to turn one of them into a forest!」

Ramiris accepts my proposal with joy all over her face.

“With the power of her mentor”——That line kind of concerns me, but whatever, that’ll do.

   

「But, we are residents of the Jura Great Forest, so shouldn’t we follow Rimuru-sama……?」

Although, I still have some reservations about it. Even Treyni-san seems to be concerned, though her facial expression says otherwise.I can tell that she wants to live with her sisters as well.

I’ve stated this several times: I personally don’t object. In fact, the interior of the labyrinth is the domain of Ramiris.

 

The region managed by me and the residence of Ramiris coexist at the same time. This is the so called special zone. It is why the area run by Ramiris inside the labyrinth can enjoy extraterritorial judiciary.

I explained the matter to them and told them that I won’t hold them accountable for anything if they migrate now, since Ramiris’s subordinates gare immortal inside the labyrinth. Moreover, I think it is best for them to serve their original master, so I made the suggestion.

「We Treants and Dryads hope to move here and seek the protection of Ramiris-sama.」

「We know that this is sudden,but will you grant us your permission?」

Trya and Doris request. And without a doubt, I permit.

And just like that, the plan to move the Treant tribe into Ramiris’ labyrinth has been approved. They’ll live on floor 95, which is currently serving as the shelter for the Beastmen. This dome shaped floor is the largest of its kind, with a diameter spanning five kilometers, so there’s plenty of space available. Another reason is that I was planning to make that level a resting zone anyway, and this just happens to help make things smoother. After all, we already have the so called forest hot spring, so the resting area can’t be too shabby either.

The issue concerning their migration is settled quickly. Ramiris went to where the Treants lived and created a new labyrinth gate to directly move the entire tribe inside. Since the treants travel very slowly, she opened up a gate in front of every individual Treant in order to speed things along.

And with that, Ramiris got a bunch of new subordinates. They even helped to stabilize the interior of the labyrinth as well. Managing the magicule concentration and the air conditioning has also become easier.. Not only that, but the Treants seem to also be content with their living conditions. The increased magicule concentration has made everyone more lively.

As for the Beastmen who are temporarily residing there, they don’t seem to care much about it either. The Treants are all very well-behaving people, spending most of their time sleeping. In addition, they look no different from normal trees, so there’s no wonder why no one minds. The beastmen will have to return to Yuurazania someday, so sharing their residence won’t really bother them. With a more comfortable living environment, they may actually come to welcome the Treants instead.

The Dryads also agreed to work on managing the labyrinth. Well, I should say that they’re more like volunteers instead of workers.

「We after all have the honour to build an amusement park here, so it is an easy task.」

Since Treyni-san put it that way, her sisters and the rest of the Dryads have no objections. Now we got some unexpected assistance.

    ………………

    …………

    ……

And so, a small forest has been added inside the labyrinth.

Level 95 is a multiple of five, so it is a safe zone. Plus, we still have some empty floors left, so we can turn level 91 to 94 into warehouses, flower beds or processing factories. To be more specific, level 91 will be warehouse for iron ore, level 92 will be the manufacturing factory that refines the ore to 「Magisteel」, level 93 will be the flower beds, and level 94 will be the honey processing plant.

Anyone from level 95 can directly reach these floors with ease due to convenient transportation. There is a save point at the center area which is set with gates that lead to different floors as well as stairs to go to lower levels. It is thanks to the fact that the labyrinth completely negates physical laws that we get such a convenient structure.

As soon as someone defeats the boss at level 90, the stairs to level 95 will immediately appear. We all agreed that there was no harm in letting the people that’ve made it to that point take a little shortcut if they so desired.

After which——

From floor 96 onwards is a grueling series of the most challenging, hellish levels. Before attempting them, adventurers need to take a rest and inspect their equipment. We didn’t forget to set up gates and caution signs before the stairs leading to the lower levels. We’ve also opened inns, weapons, and gear stores surrounding the gate. The inns have gates leading to all the safe zones. Given that to be the case, it’s very convenient in times like these.

Now let’s check out the stores selling weapons and gears. During their opening hours, the shops will only display the rare equipment exclusive to the labyrinth. I don’t think we’ll have too many customers, so they’ll most likely become stores for the blacksmithing enthusiasts.

Should I sneak one of my own work onto the shelf as well? While day-dreaming about this, I decided to discuss the plan with Myourmiles. And that’s how it is. After the end of today’s reception ceremony, I suddenly became the lil’ helper for Ramiris and her men to migrate.

This floor will later become a city of forest. Only people who have weathered through the trials of the underground labyrinth will be able to gain access here and take a rest to receive some motivation (in moving forward)——this so called 「City of Labyrinth」 will become a prosperous city of fantasy.

With that being said——At the time, I’ve not foreseen that at all.

    ***

The next day.

According to today’s schedule, we seem to be starting off with stronger species. These are the most powerful bunch among the new-comers, therefore I can expect some more intense stares to be directed at me while being observed——As if on cue, there is already a comotion taking place outside.

Members of two different tribes seem to have started a conflict with each other. Shuna frowns unpleasantly at the sight while Shion widens her eyes, forcing herself to endure her anger.

Geez, I hope things can be settled peacefully……

The people visiting are the Ox-head (Gozu) and Horse-face (Mezu) tribes[87]. Both sides brought around ten young warriors who are already engaging in a standoff. It is said that both tribes have been fighting battles against each other for over a hundred years without ever reaching a point of reconciliation.

 

The reason they are arguing this time is probably to determine who gets to go in first for the reception. Perhaps they think that whoever comes first will get the upper hand, but I am staying out of this mess no matter what. The day has barely started and I’ve already gotten a headache. With their relationship being this tense, I’m honestly worried about them kicking off a brawl any moment. They attempt to pull each other back as they move in front of me. Naturally for the high-ranked tribe in the Jura Great Forest, their strength is reflected in their arrogance.

The Majin with ox horns is the first to speak.

「Yo, Demon Lord-sama, we are the ones that will be of real use on the battlefield! With us Gozu Tribe in your alliance, we can definitely stand tall in this forest! If we eliminate those weaklings from the Mezu tribe, no other race in this forest can stand against us!」

As expected from a race with impressive strength, not only is he not afraid of me, he even begins to brag. Actually, compared to the Ogre tribe and Lizardmen tribe in the past, they (Gozu) do possess a higher magicule content. Just giving them a more careful look will reveal that several of them are already at Rank A. There’s no wonder that they were able to continue a war for as long as a hundred years. Based on combat capabilities alone, they may indeed be the strongest in Jura Great Forest……

Before I can make any response, the Mezu Majin begins to shout angrily as well.

「Hmph, bunch of fools! If you are a Demon Lord, surely you have a grander vision. So do not hesitate and collaborate with us Mezu Tribe. Let us slaughter not only these Gozu, but any monster who dares to defy us.」

Both of them are spouting unreasonable nonsense and their type of explosive personality already has me frustrated. It seems that the rabbitmen who weren’t fooled by my appearance turn out to be more distinguished.

But, hold on a sec?

They are indeed irritating, but upon seeing these guys, an idea suddenly popped into my head. Honestly, whenever we think about a labyrinth, the first thing that comes to people’s mind should be 「Minotaur」.

In Greek mythology, there was a famous ox-head labyrinth monster called the Minotaur——People thought that it was a legend or a fable passed on by generations, yet in the early twentieth century, they actually dug up the Knossos palace on the Crete Island. The palace had a complex interior structure with its basement resembling a labyrinth.

Anyway, putting aside whether the Minotaur actually existed or not, the palace was supposedly filled with various paintings depicting an ox——That’s how the Minotaur became the iconic staple of any self respecting underground labyrinth. It must be my lucky day, because the Gozu race, resembling the Minotaur from people’s fantasies, is just the thing our labyrinth was lacking!

Upon seeing the giant creature that is likely their leader, isn’t he a good candidate for that? I thought to myself.

The weakest part of our underground labyrinth is the selection of bosses. Right now we’ve only captured some rather impressive monsters and placed them at levels 10, 20 and 30. This guy (Gozu), would be most suited to defend levels 40 to 50——That’s how I see it.

I would love to appoint him a boss on some floor——Such thoughts continue to pour out of my mind. But, reality is often disappointing. These monsters don’t seem to have much loyalty towards me.

At most they are thinking 「This guy could be a pretty good employer.」 Moreover, their intention of using me to eliminate their rival is obvious. They would be of so much use if they just behave themselves a little. Such are my honest opinions.

That’s why I decide to activate some of my 「Demon Lord Haki」. I hope that they will realize how strong I am and pledge their allegiance——Eh, these people completely missed out. They continue to argue against each other right in front of me…… Although it would be quite rude, should I perhaps dull their spirits a bit so I can recruit them?

I was just about to put that thought into action——

「You punks, how dare you act so rude in front of our king. I, Rigurdo shall show you all your places!」

While flexing his muscles, Rigurdo moves forward. While he usually treats people kindly and actively attends to national affairs in town, I know that he has been secretly working out. In fact, he has already outperformed youngsters such as Gobta and Rigur. He even volunteered himself for the fight against the Holy Knights, he clearly has an aggressive side. I’m confident that he could beat the leaders of these two tribes.

「What did you just say? How can a mere civil official be so pompous!」

「You’re just a lackey of some weakling Demon Lord, quit bluffing now!」

The two leaders rebuke, the rest of the youngsters responding in a similar manner. They’ve been underestimating me before as well, the only people to be so pompous are them. All I needed to do was release some of my 「Demon Lord Haki」 before and any monsters who encountered me until now has obeyed nicely. These people however are clearly itching for a fight and totally lack awareness of their situation.

Rather than fearing me, it is better that you look down on me since it’s easier to deal with that way. But I might have to reevaluate my policy now that they’ve crossed the line. Surely they will settle down once we’ve ruffled them up a bit.

Rigurdo is looking at me. As I was about to grant him permission——

「What is that!」

「……This is……」

「——Geez, there seems to be something troublesome?」

 

「Hmph, it’s probably nothing.」

A shockingly imposing sensation is emitting from outside the town. The 「Barrier」 constructed by Shuna has been shattered, followed by monsters with immense Youki (Demonic Aura) and large pools of magicule appearing——No, they are Majins.

From the hostility they are giving off alone, it is evident that they’ve not come in peace. Even the Gozu and Mezu tribes, who didn’t notice my 「Demon Lord Haki」, turn pale immediately after sensing this.

「S-Such power——」

「Hold up, hold up hold up now, Demon Lord-sama, could it be that the other Demon Lords have invaded……?」

The Gozu and Mezu tribesmen start to shiver after they say so. Before this, Jura Great Forest has always been under the protection of the pact formed by the Demon Lords. The reason they are so conceited is because they’ve never seen the world beyond here. They’ve been forced to reevaluate their own abilities upon facing a real threat.

 Although the romantic concept of a Minotaur boss is one of my top priorities, I’ve suddenly got bigger fish to fry.

I immediately use 「Transformation」 to turn into my human form and tell Benimaru and the rest 「Let’s go」.

「Yes sir!」

「Understood.」

As I hear everyone’s response, I head straight towards the direction of that powerful aura.

    ………………

    …………

    ……

Upon arriving at the scene, there are around ten members from the 「Kurenai」 surrounding the three men responsible. A couple of guards, gate keepers and members of 「Yomigaeri」 are lying on the ground. Ah, Gobjay is there too. He seems to have done his best, but running straight at these intruders was just reckless.

The people who weren’t injured are assisting the townsfolk and guests to take shelter. They’ve received training on how to handle emergencies, so things are going smoothly without stirring up too much chaos. The fact that anyone got hurt kind of pisses me off anyway.

I turn to the three culprits. One of them is a slim and tall, polite-looking man who wears an ear-ring. There’s also a brawny man with bulky muscle who wears a nose-ring. And the last one has quite a large build. He’s a short and plump man who wears a mouth-ring. Their hairstyles are all very bizarre and each of them a different color. 「Like delinquents with dyed hair」——That’s a rather appropriate metaphor for the trio.

「Who the hell are you people, have you come to cause trouble knowing that this is Demon Lord Rimuru-sama’s domain?」

Shion, who followed after me, demanded from them. In response, the ear-ring guy steps forward with a smile.

「Get lost and out of my way. I’ve got no interest in scrubs. I was planning to kill that Clayman to take the Demon Lord seat, but it looks like someone screwed that up for me and now I’m quite pissed about it. I don’t do needless killing, but if anyone dares to get in my way, I won’t be so nice no more!」

His attitude is rude and imposing, but given the sights of the people lying on the ground, none of their lives were taken. Considering the difference in magicule storage, not even a「Yomigaeri」would not survive if he really did intended to kill them. His claim about not doing needless killing was apparently true.

It seems that I may have judged them too harshly based on appearance alone, they are not as wicked as I imagined. But since they’ve come to stir up trouble, we will have to strike back. Especially at times like this when we are hosting the Demon Lord inauguration. The opening festival is drawing nearer, many merchants from various nations are already visiting. Causing a commotion in these delicate times isn’t something I’ll punish lightly..

What a troublesome affair, but it cannot be helped. I shall take them on myself then——

「Rimuru-sama, please hold on. Leave this to me.」

As I was about to act, Shion speaks up to stop me. Benimaru wanted to go first too, but after his eyes met with Shion’s, they seemed to have decided the sequence of their showdown. Benimaru probably conceded because Shion’s subordinates were beaten by them.

「Oh, are you Demon Lord Rimuru’s entourage? My old man has told me (about you), aren’t you the female Kijin that beat the shit out of that asshole Clayman? How interesting. You’ll get me warmed up——」

   

「Hold on, big bro (aniki). The Demon Lord is all yours, so at least spare some of his entourages for us.」

   

「Mmm——Mmmhmm, that’s right. My tummy is hungry too, so even one is fine.」

It seems that the three are brothers. The eldest brother is the one wearing the ear-ring, the other two are his younger brothers. However, not only did their father tell them about me, they’ve even heard of the battle between Clayman and Shion.

In other words, the father of these guys is either a Demon Lord or someone close to a Demon Lord. All three possess magicule to rival that of unawakened Clayman, it is likely that they are sons of a Demon Lord.

Then, who would that be……? Guy, Milim, Ramiris, Ruminas——it’s definitely not these four. Dagruel, Dino and Leon, is it one of them——Dino and Leon are unlikely as well, does this perhaps leave Dagruel to be our prime suspect?

As thoughts go through my mind, Shion steps forward.

「Silence. We are busy hosting the reception ceremony for Rimuru-sama, so time is precious. Let me take on the three of you altogether.」

 

「Ah?」

「Oi oi oi, are you looking down on us?」

 

「I was going to hold back since you are a woman, but never mind that. You gonna cry, you definitely gonna cry.」

「Mm,——Mmmhmm, my tummy just reacted to your words a bit. Now I can get the grand meal I’ve been missing to fill my stomach.」

Shion’s words caused me to gasp out of surprise. No matter how you put it, it is still a stretch for Shion alone to take on three persons beyond her ability at once. I was going to stop her, but she has already been angered, so there’s nothing I could do to stop her now.

Why is Shion so heated today……

「B-Benimaru-kun?」

「Just let Shion do her thing. She does a better job than me in holding back.」

……

The swiftness of Benimaru’s answer made me speechless. If that’s the case I’ll just have to give up. I’ll let Shion do whatever she wants and hope for the best.

The town must not be destroyed. I suggest to change the venue, surprisingly the three agreed without hesitation. They observe the city’s appearance with intrigue as I guide them to the recently constructed colosseum.

   

「Hey, woman, I admire your boldness, I’ll let it slide if you retract your words right now!」

Shion sneers at the suggestion of the ear-ring dude. She even provokes the trio with such hard-boiled statement with her hot-blooded spirit that came out of nowhere.

「I’ll give you a lesson on how one’s combat prowess is not determined by the amount of magicule they have!」

A lively crowd has already gathered to relish the battle breaking out between the trio, who just came to settle a score with the Demon Lord, and Shion.

——The result is the overwhelming victory of Shion.

The fat man with mouth-ring was unexpectedly agile, launching himself like a cannon ball at Shion in a manner unfitting for his build. Unfazed by this, Shion countered it with a roundhouse kick and sent him hurling towards the ear-ring guy. Using this moment as an opening, while the nose-ring guy was speechless (at the sight), she snuck in to grab onto his arm and collar to deliver an over-shoulder throw. Nose-ring guy’s head smashed squarely onto the stone pavement —— No more motion seemed to be coming from him anymore.

   

「UHHHH, how dare you harm my bro!」

The mouth-ring guy sprang up from behind and tried to grab and lock her, yet Shion’s superhuman strength would not allow him to do anything of the sort.

 

「W-What the hell! Am I not the stronger one……」

While glaring down at the shocked mouth-ring guy, Shion laughs with disdain. She turns around to face the fellow and begins to twist his arms, testing his strength.

「Agh, GUGIGIGIGIGI……」[88]

Snap

 

How pitiful, the two arms of the mouth-ring guy were folded into an abnormal angle, though since this guy is a monster, I’m sure he’ll be fine. He was obviously in a lot of pain though, so he must’ve suffered heavy damage. Yet Shion wouldn’t even give him another look before finishing him off with her iron fist. The mouth-ring guy didn’t even have time to lament before Shion punched the living soul out of him.

It is then that a strong kick was launched by the ear-ring guy, Shion narrowly dodged it by leaning back slightly. However, a grin emerges on the ear-ring guy’s face as he stops his leg.

Danger——As the thought crossed my mind, it was already too late, the leg that the ear-ring guy just stopped midair rushes downward like a vicious axe in an attempt to crush Shion’s head.

Thump! A heavy sound was made. Yet Shion’s head was hard as a rock, breaking ear-ring guy’s foot instead. Shion then launched a lower sweep kick to break his other leg, forcing the ear-ring guy to collapse onto the ground. She crossed her legs over him to sit on his body and proceeded to lay down a series of punches without mercy.

As such, Shion emerged victorious. She didn’t even have the chance to unsheath her beloved sword Hercules · Ex before giving the three a beatdown.

Her power has obviously increased. She has beaten opponents with a higher magicule pool than her without even getting tired. And she took care of three in one go, how terrifying.

「B-Benimaru-kun? Shion is——」

「Yes, it is quite astounding alright. But it seems that she has mastered the way of controlling her strength.」

 

Eh, that’s not the issue at all——!

This isn’t Milim we are talking about here, where is this strength even coming from? Benimaur’s view seems pretty strange, but that’s not what I wanted to talk about…… Never mind, there’s no use saying anything more.

By the way, Shion, she’s truly strong. From this fight, it was proven that by utilizing mana in a different way, even when you are confronted by a rival on par in strength, you can still defeat them with ease. The experience she gained from giving Clayman a beat down must have helped her improve greatly.

Benimaru also believes that this is only natural as he seems unfazed after witnessing the scene. Although I still can’t quite accept it, Shion has brawled with an ex-Demon Lord after all. I suppose that Benimaru and maybe even both Souei and Geld can do the same.

No no no, I’m definitely thinking too much. I seem to have been overwhelmed after witnessing Shion’s growth.

「Pardon me, is this still not enough?」

I’m not sure whether she has misunderstood the shock in my heart or not, Shion slants her eyes at the trio lying on the ground. I immediately reply 「No no no, that’s plenty!」 to stop her. How is it not enough, you are actually being excessive.

「Now that you’ve learnt your lesson, you better not bother us ever again! Also, the other Demon Lords are less forgiving than me, so don’t try your luck with them.」

   

I tell the trio, who are still unable to get up after getting punished by Shion’s iron fist. The nose-ring guy who has regained consciousness nods heavily in response. This advice is for their own good, after all. These people seem to have gotten full of themselves to have attempted to challenge a Demon Lord. It was fortunate that they came to me. If it was any other Demon Lord, they may have suffered more than they just did at the hands of Shion.

「She’s stronger than how the old man put it……」

It seems that they’ve woken up as the ear-ring guy whispers to add on.

「Big bro, that would mean Demon Lord Rimuru is——」

 

「Yep, he’s gotta be stronger.」

「Mmm——mmmHmm, I’m so hungry.」

The three start to look at me with respect. One of them acts pretty weird, but I shouldn’t really think too much of it.

   

「So, who sent you guys?」

I don’t want any more trouble so I decide to clarify the relations behind them. If they are willing to tell me honestly——I didn’t expect this concern of mine to be resolved as well.

「Yes sir! We are the sons of Demon Lord Dagruel. I’m his eldest son Dagura.」

「I am his second son Ryura.」

 

「I am the third son Debura!」

 

The three decide to spill the beans altogether without hesitation. As I expected, they are indeed Demon Lord Dagruel’s sons.

「Oi oi oi, you just admitted it so fast like that, is it really okay?」

「Yeah. In fact our old man wanted us to go train under Demon Lord Rimuru.」

「We were just messing around for a bit, but he lost his temper big time……」

   

「Hmmhmm, we were chased out by dad!」

 

Why are you admitting everything now, also, excuse me what? So to put it simply, he couldn’t discipline his delinquent sons and decided to push the babysitting work to me?

Dagruel you bastard! We aren’t even that close, how dare you make this decision without asking for permission……

But, isn’t it not half bad to sell him a favour first? Our faction has yet to have a firm stand yet, we don’t intend to antagonize an established faction at this point of time. I personally think they are quite troublesome, but there happens to be the devil of a drill sergeant Shion. I’ve seen her training for Gobjay and the others, her methods were crueler than Hakurou, even I was a bit terrified.

If I hand these guys to Shion, they will eventually run away after they can’t bear it. When they leave by themselves, I would have done my part as well. Then Dagruel won’t have any basis to complain about this to me, no problemo.

「Alright, then you guys can go train with Shion.」

With my words out, I turn to Shion. She probably doesn’t want to take them, but I’ve already tossed the conversation to her.

Unexpectedly, Shion nods to me with an evil grin.

——Eh? Her reaction was different than I expected?

「Hehehe, just now, Rimuru-sama has appointed me, Shion. Even softies like you three can more or less have some growth in my hands and turn into first-class warriors. Just rest assured and follow my lead!」

「Yes ma’am, that’s just what we want!」

「Understood! Allow us to follow big sis’s lead and work hard!」

「I wanna too! But before that, please give me something to eat!」

   

Surprisingly enough, Shion takes on the job eagerly. It’s great that she has no objection, so I’ll just go with her flow. Then we leave Shion and the trio and return to the reception hall.

There seem to be voices coming from behind my back——「Sensei, actually, allow me to call you master (Shishou 師匠)!」, 「Hmm, you guys, remember to follow my teaching well!」. Best that I pretend not to hear them.

    ………………

    …………

    ……

Back at the reception hall, I see that the Gozu and Mezu tribesmen kneeled there shivering with pale faces. The youngsters who were brought along all imitate the leaders and bow their head on their knees. Their previous arrogance is all gone and they look awfully powerless now as if they were some pathetic tribes from somewhere.

「W-We humbly await your highness’s return!」

「We’ve decided to pledge our loyalty to Demon Lord Rimuru-sama!」

What type of emotional rollercoaster have you guys been through? Their attitudes are completely different from before.

I returned to my throne and turned back to a slime. I thought that they were going to switch back to the conceited attitude, but there doesn’t seem to be any sign of that.

「You guys serious?」

「O-Of course!」

「Please command us at will!」

It seems that they’ve really changed their minds. They are trying very hard, seemingly to get on my good side from the bottom of their heart. I see. After witnessing the commotion just now, they must find Shion quite terrifying.
